T02TD1348E:1b-1: shr'i pa ra m'artha se b'a /
T02TD1348E:1b-3: dpal don dam pa'i bsnyen pa /
T02TD1348E:1b-4: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1348E:1b-5: khams gsum la ni ye shes nyin mor [dd] byed pa yi //
T02TD1348E:1b-6: dpal ldan sh'akya'i seng+ge byams pa'i mgon po dang //
T02TD1348E:1b-7: 'jam dbyangs bcas pa yid bzhin nor dang grags pa dang //
T02TD1348E:1b-8: rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te //

T02TD1348E:1b-11: mdor bsdus pas ni 'jig rten lugs ni spangs nas su //
T02TD1348E:1b-12: don dam bsnyen pa de ni bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02TD1348E:1b-13: 'dod pa'i dngos grub slob dpon zhal gyi rjes 'brang bar //
T02TD1348E:1b-14: ma lus rdo rje theg par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs //
T02TD1348E:1b-15: de phyir slob ma dam pa rnams kyis bla ma gser bzhin du //
T02TD1348E:1b-16: yongs su brtags na sdig pa cung zad yod ma yin //
T02TD1348E:1b-17: gang las khyab 'jug bde 'byung drag po zla ba dang //
T02TD1348E:1b-18: nyi ma rgyu skar sgra gcan gza' sogs gyur pa yi //
T02TD1348E:1b-19: rdo rje sems dpa' yab de dag ni rnam spangs te //
T02TD1348E:2a-0: @2a * // rmongs pas 'jig rten mes po'i lam la len par byed //
T02TD1348E:2a-1: 'jig rten dag gi nges pa tshad mas dman pa ste //
T02TD1348E:2a-2: lta ba'i chos kyi dbye ba dag gi rnam pa mang //
T02TD1348E:2a-3: rig byed rtogs par dka' zhing dran pa tha dad pas ;
T02TD1348E:2a-4: /'jig rten 'dir ni mkhas pa rnams kyis gang zhig 'dzin //

T02TD1348E:2a-7: lta ba drug tu gnas pa bla mar rab grags pa ;

T02TD1348E:2a-9: bla ma'i zhal gyis dman pa dag gis rgyud thos zer //
T02TD1348E:2a-10: mngon par dbang bskur mi 'gyur lam ni ma thob par //
T02TD1348E:2a-11: rdo rje slob dpon go 'phang chen po 'dir byed de //
T02TD1348E:2a-12: skye po rmongs pa 'di la ci zhig spyad pa'o //
T02TD1348E:2a-13: nor 'dod brkam pas mngon par dbang ni bskur bar byed //
T02TD1348E:2a-14: rang gi dkyil 'khor rdul tshon dag gis bri byed de //
T02TD1348E:2a-15: rdo yi rang bzhin 'dod pa'i rtags la mchod par byed //
T02TD1348E:2a-16: 'bar ba'i thab khung du ni mar la sogs pa sreg / aom yig h'um yig ces ni 'dod pa'i sngags yin te //
T02TD1348E:2a-17: gzhan la phan pa ru ni 'di nyid brjod pa yin //
T02TD1348E:2a-18: blo gros nyams pa yis ni 'di dag mi shes te //

T02TD1348E:2b-5: padma'i snying po ltar ni mgrin pa bstungs nas su //
T02TD1348E:2b-6: g-yon can rkang pa ya gcig gis ni gnas pa ste //
T02TD1348E:2b-7: chu skyar 'dis ni nya rnams 'khrul pa byed pa ltar //
T02TD1348E:2b-8: bla ma ngan pas 'gro ba rnams la bya dkar bzhin //
T02TD1348E:2b-9: ji ltar zlos gar mkhan gyis gar gyi ngo bo bsgyur //
T02TD1348E:2b-10: 'khor ba lha yi dbang po'i gzugs su byed pa ltar //
T02TD1348E:2b-11: lam dag med dang nor la 'dod cing brkam pa yis //
T02TD1348E:2b-12: de bzhin dbang la rgyal ba'i cod pan 'ching bar byed //
T02TD1348E:2b-13: 'dod la lhag zhen chang gi dbang gis bag med cing //
T02TD1348E:2b-14: khro ba'i sems dang bcas shing rdzas la mang du zhen //
T02TD1348E:2b-15: bden pa ma yin smra zhing bu rnams slu 'dod pa //

T02TD1348E:2b-17: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal me dag gis ni gdungs pa yis //
T02TD1348E:2b-18: rab rib mig gis bla ma dag gis gzung byas pa //
T02TD1348E:2b-19: shin tu gdung ba gzhom phyir lam chen gnas pa yi //
T02TD1348E:2b-20: gnyid log sbrul gyi dug gis 'khrul pa bzhin du'o //
T02TD1348E:2b-21: chos la zhen dang mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba la //
T02TD1348E:2b-22: rab zhen sems ldan rmongs pa'i skye bo du ma la //
T02TD1348E:2b-23: yongs su brtags na dmyal ba'i me ni ster ba po //
T02TD1348E:2b-24: bla ma ngan pa ci yi phyir na sten par byed //

T02TD1348E:2b-26: shes dang nges zhugs snying rje la sogs tha mi dad //
T02TD1348E:2b-27: dbang po bral zhing rtog pa brtag pa ru ni dang //
T02TD1348E:2b-28: gnyis su med cing kun 'gro nges par zhi ba nyid //
T02TD1348E:2b-29: de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' dpal //
T02TD1348E:2b-30: de nyid 'jig rten mgon dang dpal ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs //
T02TD1348E:2b-31: de ni thugs kyi rdo rje rdo rje mkha' 'gro dpal //
T02TD1348E:2b-32: de ni mi 'gyur 'gyur med rnal 'byor gyis ni bgrod //
T02TD1348E:2b-33: de ni dbang phyug khyab 'jug dag dang mes po ste //
T02TD1348E:2b-34: bdud sogs 'joms med bde gshegs rgyal dbang po //
T02TD1348E:2b-35: grags pa de ni thub pa sh'akya seng+ge dpal //
T02TD1348E:2b-36: de ni sangs rgyas thams cad dpal ldan dus 'khor lo //
T02TD1348E:2b-37: sprul pa 'di ltar zhi ba de ni bla ma dpal //
T02TD1348E:3a-0: rab tu sbas pa'i sangs rgyas bde @3a * //

T02TD1348E:4b-0: gla rtsi la sogs pa yis bdud mang @4b dgra la'o //

T02TD1348E:4b-5: byug pa dang ni gur gum tsandan la sogs pa //

T02TD1348E:4b-8: rin chen mar mes lam ni mi nyams la'o //
T02TD1348E:4b-9: rtsod ldan dbang gis bla ma skyon dang yon tan 'dres //
T02TD1348E:4b-10: rnam pa kun du sdig pa med pa yong ma yin //
