T02TD1348E:5a-13: phyag mang ba dang mchod pa dag kyang mdzad pa ste //
T02TD1348E:5a-14: 'on kyang mya ngan 'das pa'i lam la chags pa min //
T02TD1348E:5a-15: chung ma bu dang rtsa lag mang po'i sde rnams dang //
T02TD1348E:5a-16: so ba nor dang rgyal srid dgra med phyogs dang ni //
T02TD1348E:5a-17: grub pa nyid dang dbang po drang srong dang bcas pa //
T02TD1348E:5a-18: re zhig lus po 'di ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
T02TD1348E:5a-19: khams gsum rnam pa brtan pa dag dang g-yo ba ni //
T02TD1348E:5a-20: cung zhig mi bzad pa ni gal te 'dir mthong dang //
T02TD1348E:5a-21: gang zhig dngos po'i gzugs ni mi shigs yod 'gyur na //
T02TD1348E:5a-22: 'di rnams dag la gti mug ched du chags par gyis //
T02TD1348E:5a-23: ji srid 'chi bdag rab tu ma sang bar du ni //
T02TD1348E:5a-24: de srid du ni khyod kyis lus 'di bsrung bar gyis //
T02TD1348E:5a-25: 'di ni rab tu sad na khyod kyis bsrungs na yang //
T02TD1348E:5a-26: lus ni nges pa ru ni ce spyang rnams la ster //
T02TD1348E:5a-27: de bzhin du ni chung ma dang ni bu dang rtsa lag dang //
T02TD1348E:5a-28: grogs dang mgon po dag la skyabs su song na yang //
T02TD1348E:5a-29: 'bar ba la sogs pa la dus kyis byin pas na //
T02TD1348E:5a-30: dbang po la sogs kyis ni bsrung bar nus ma yin //
T02TD1348E:5a-31: grub pa dang ni drang srong lha yi dbang po dang //
T02TD1348E:5a-32: dpag med bgrang du med pa de yis zad par khrid //
T02TD1348E:5a-33: ye shes me ni ji srid mthong bar ma gyur par //
T02TD1348E:5a-34: rang gi las dag su zhig gis ni bzlog par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:5a-35: 'di dag thams cad mi rtag 'dod pa ma yin te //
T02TD1348E:5a-36: ye shes bdud rtsi bla ma'i zhal ni 'dod pa'o //
T02TD1348E:5a-37: gnyis po 'di las bde dang sdug bsngal rab tu skyed //
T02TD1348E:5a-38: nges par legs par brtags na ci zhig la ni len //
T02TD1348E:5b-0: 'khor pa'i rdzod dag tu ni @5b 'khyam pa'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD1348E:5b-1: ji srid rang gi lus la mchod par byed pa pas //
T02TD1348E:5b-2: mya ngan las 'das bde ba ma lus ster mdzad pa //
T02TD1348E:5b-3: de srid de ni bla mar ci yi phyir mi byed //
T02TD1348E:5b-4: rang gis bsags pa'i nor rnams kun kyang byin nas ni //
T02TD1348E:5b-5: dmyal ba'i me ster bud med dag ni len par byed //
T02TD1348E:5b-6: sangs rgyas yan lag bzang mo 'khyud pa ster mdzad gang //
T02TD1348E:5b-7: ci phyir bzang mo de ni bla ma la mi 'bul //
T02TD1348E:5b-8: so ba dang ni nor rnams yid du 'ong ba dang //
T02TD1348E:5b-9: yan lag bzang mo dag ni bsod nams stobs las 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:5b-10: sdig pa dag gi dbang gis yun rings bsags pa yi ;
T02TD1348E:5b-11: / rab tu 'bad de bsrung bar byas kyang nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:5b-12: de phyir khyad par 'phags shing yid du 'ong ba yi //
T02TD1348E:5b-13: skye ba du ma ru ni bde ba ster byed pa //
T02TD1348E:5b-14: gang la nges par phul bas rab tu 'gyur ba yi //
T02TD1348E:5b-15: nor rnams kun gyis bla ma'i zhal la dbul bar bya //
T02TD1348E:5b-16: byin pa'i nor rnams 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD1348E:5b-17: shin tu rnam dag sa la sa bon btab pa bzhin //
T02TD1348E:5b-18: de rnams rab tu ma byin 'bras bu med pa ni //
T02TD1348E:5b-19: dper na sa bzang dag la sa bon ma btab par //
T02TD1348E:5b-20: sa bon ma btab zhing la 'bru yi ched du ni //
T02TD1348E:5b-21: rmongs pa shin tu nyon mongs par ni byed pa ltar //
T02TD1348E:5b-22: bla ma la ni nor ma phul ba de bzhin du //
T02TD1348E:5b-23: 'dzin par 'dod pa dag ni sa la 'khyam par byed //
T02TD1348E:5b-24: nor la 'dod cing brkam pas zhing gi las la ni //
T02TD1348E:5b-25: rten dang tshong dang rig pa dag ni 'dzin par byed //
T02TD1348E:5b-26: de ltar na yang bkren pa'i dus ni du ma ru //
T02TD1348E:5b-27: myur ba dag tu 'ongs nas sdig can la ni gnas //
T02TD1348E:5b-28: nyon mongs ma gtogs 'bru dang gser dang chung ma dang //
T02TD1348E:5b-29: bsod nams mang byed pa la bsam mi khyab par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:5b-30: grub pa nyid dang dbang po drang srong mchog rnams dang //
T02TD1348E:5b-31: dgra med rgyal srid sa bzhi'i bde ba ster ba'o //
T02TD1348E:5b-32: khams gsum dag na gang dag bde ba cung zad ni //
T02TD1348E:5b-33: ma lus de ni bla ma dgyes pa'i stobs kyis so //
T02TD1348E:5b-34: bkres dang nad dang dmyal ba'i me yi sdug bsngal ni //
T02TD1348E:5b-35: mi bzad de ni mi dgyes pa las byung ba yin //
T02TD1348E:5b-36: bla ma'i drin byis 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'gyur pa ni //
T02TD1348E:6a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bla med rgyud gsungs @6a * //
T02TD1348E:6a-2: / de ni ma dgyes pa yis dmyal bar 'jug pa yi //
T02TD1348E:6a-3: tshig 'di nyid ni de dang de yi rgyud la gnas //
T02TD1348E:6a-4: yon tan dam pas gang bar bla ma'i thugs shes nas //
T02TD1348E:6a-5: 'khor ba'i rgyu ru gang rnams kyis ni dor bar byed //
T02TD1348E:6a-6: grangs med bskal par bde ba nyams pa de rnams ni //
T02TD1348E:6a-7: rdo rje me yis smin pa'i dmyal ba dag tu 'tshed //
T02TD1348E:6a-8: bla ma dam pa slu bar byed dang sdig sogs gang //
T02TD1348E:6a-9: slob ma 'ba' zhig rnams ni de ru mi 'tshed kyi //
T02TD1348E:6a-10: de bzhin bla ma yang ni zhen pa'i dbang gis nyams //
T02TD1348E:6a-11: chags pa la sogs 'bar ba'i me la rab tu 'jug / bla ma dang ni slob ma nges par rnam par nyams //
T02TD1348E:6a-12: rang rang sdug bsngal 'di ni gnyis ka'i thun mong ngo //
T02TD1348E:6a-13: de bas bla ma slob ma 'di ru nyams pa ni //
T02TD1348E:6a-14: rang gi blo yis ring du yongs su spang bar bya //
T02TD1348E:6a-15: smyon pa rdo rje'i sen mo gdong pa lnga pa dang //
T02TD1348E:6a-16: rkang brgyad khro bo'i gdong la mche ba dang ldan dang //
T02TD1348E:6a-17: shin tu khro ba'i gdengs ka 'dzin pa mchog yin gyi //
T02TD1348E:6a-18: lam nyams bla ma slob ma dag ni 'di ltar min //
T02TD1348E:6a-19: bla ma ltung ba las ni slob ma mi ltung ba //
T02TD1348E:6a-20: slob ma ltung ba yis ni bla ma yang mi nyams //
T02TD1348E:6a-21: shing gi yal ga mthon por 'dzeg pa dag las ni //
T02TD1348E:6a-22: gang zhig ltung bar gyur pa de ni 'chi bar 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:6a-23: bla na med pa'i rgyud las ltung ba bcu bzhis ni //
T02TD1348E:6a-24: rtsa ba dang bcas dngos grub dag ni 'phrog par byed //
T02TD1348E:6a-25: dpag med bskal pa ru ni bde ba rnam par nyams //
T02TD1348E:6a-26: las ngan la gnas dbang bskur slob ma rnams la gsung //
T02TD1348E:6a-27: bla ma'i sems sun pa yis ltung ba gcig yin te //
T02TD1348E:6a-28: bka' ni yongs su spangs pa'i dbang las gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1348E:6a-29: spun la rab tu khros nas smra ba gsum pa ste //
T02TD1348E:6a-30: byams pa yongs su spangs pa'i dbang gis bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1348E:6a-31: dpal ldan byang chub sems spangs dbang gis mda' zhes bya //
T02TD1348E:6a-32: grub pa'i mtha' la skyon bzung pas ni drug pa ste //
T02TD1348E:6a-33: sngags pa min la phebs par smra bas ri zhes bya //
T02TD1348E:6a-34: phung po so sor nyon mongs byed pa brgyad pa yin //
T02TD1348E:6a-35: dag pa'i chos la ma dad pas ni gza' zhes bya //
T02TD1348E:6a-36: gdug pa dang bcas byams pa bzung bas phyogs zhes so //
T02TD1348E:6a-37: dam pa'i chos la kun rtog dbang gis drag po zhes //
T02TD1348E:6a-38: dag pa'i sems can sun 'byin pa yis nyi ma ste //
T02TD1348E:6b-0: dam tshig bsten @6b bar ma byas pa yis yan lag med //
T02TD1348E:6b-1: bud med rnams la bshung ba yis ni bcu bzhi yin //
T02TD1348E:6b-2: 'di rnams dag ni yongs su spangs par byas nas ni //
T02TD1348E:6b-3: 'dod pa'i blo yis bla ma la ni brten par bya //
T02TD1348E:6b-4: 'dod chags la sogs pa dang mi shes dbang gis ni //
T02TD1348E:6b-5: bag med slob ma rnams ni gal te ltung 'gyur na //
T02TD1348E:6b-6: slar yang rab tu gnas par bya phyir dbang nyid ni //
T02TD1348E:6b-7: phyir bzlog pa la 'di ni nges par bya ba'o //
T02TD1348E:6b-8: dbang bdun bskur ba rnams la zlog pa yod pa ste //
T02TD1348E:6b-9: mi shes dbang gis gsang pa la ni brgya lam na //
T02TD1348E:6b-10: shes rab mngon par dbang bskur ba la ldog med de ;
T02TD1348E:6b-11: / dper na mi yi bdag po g-yul du shi bzhin no //
T02TD1348E:6b-12: lha mo re re'i rgyal ba'i sngags ni brjod pa las //
T02TD1348E:6b-13: stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug po ni nges bya zhing //
T02TD1348E:6b-14: bzlas pa dag gi mtha' ru tshogs kyis tshim par bya //
T02TD1348E:6b-15: thun mong skyon gyis kyang ni chad pa 'di nyid yin //
T02TD1348E:6b-16: ji ltar rang gi nus pas bla ma la ni yon //
T02TD1348E:6b-17: phul nas rang gi rigs su thun mong pa ru 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:6b-18: de yi sems kyi rten dag shes par byas nas ni //
T02TD1348E:6b-19: lhag pa 'am ni nyung bar bla mas nges par sbyin //
T02TD1348E:6b-20: tshogs dang bzlas pa'am ni mchod pa dag gis te //
T02TD1348E:6b-21: de rnams la ni bla ma dag par rab sbyin bya //
T02TD1348E:6b-22: shin tu ring ba'i shing las ring por lhung gyur pa'i //
T02TD1348E:6b-23: lus po la ni rkang pas brdeg par mi bya'o //
T02TD1348E:6b-24: de dag rnams kyi sems la skyon ni rjes gnas pa //
T02TD1348E:6b-25: 'di rnams 'chad pa ci zhig sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen te //
T02TD1348E:6b-26: de lta na yang rmongs pas rab sad bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1348E:6b-27: chad pa sbyin gyi 'di ni chad pa ma yin no ;
T02TD1348E:6b-28: / gang zhig sems la gnas pa'i ma lus mkhyen pa yi //
T02TD1348E:6b-29: rje mo dang bcas bde bar gshegs pas 'chad pa sol //
T02TD1348E:6b-30: dge dang mi dge las kyi 'bras bu de rnams la //
T02TD1348E:6b-31: chad pa gang ster bla ma 'dir ni gang zhig yin //
T02TD1348E:6b-32: dpyid zla 'bring po'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi cha la ni //
T02TD1348E:6b-33: dpal ldan dkyil 'khor de ni legs par bris nas su //
T02TD1348E:6b-34: bla mas mngon par dbang bskur rnam bdun sbyin bya zhing //
T02TD1348E:6b-35: dpal ldan bstan pa'i don du 'khor lo mchod par bya //
T02TD1348E:6b-36: mchod pa med pas nges par dus kyi 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1348E:6b-37: bstan pa dag ni dag pa'i lo 'di ma yin no //
T02TD1348E:7a-2: 'khor lo'i mchod pa bcu gnyis dag ni de yis bya //
T02TD1348E:7a-3: ji ltar bu bzangs kyis ni bag ma blang ba'i rgyur //
T02TD1348E:7a-4: rang gi pha la nam yang gsol ba mi 'debs te //
T02TD1348E:7a-5: yon tan dang bcas dus la bab pa'i bu la ni //
T02TD1348E:7a-6: pha nyid kyis ni bag ma'i bya ba shes par byed //
T02TD1348E:7a-7: de bzhin slob ma rnams kyis bla med dbang gi phyir //
T02TD1348E:7a-8: bla ma la ni nan gyis gsol ba mi gdab bo //
T02TD1348E:7a-9: bdag gi slob ma skal ba ldan nam mi ldan pa'i //
T02TD1348E:7a-10: rnam par dag pa'i de nyid de la de yis shes //
T02TD1348E:7a-11: rnam par dag pa'i slob ma nor ni med pa la //
T02TD1348E:7a-12: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu ru dbang bskur rin po che //
T02TD1348E:7a-13: rang gi ngag gis kun nas rnam par dag pa 'di //
T02TD1348E:7a-14: mchod pa med na'ang bla ma yis ni sbyin par bya //
T02TD1348E:7a-15: chags pas mngon par khengs pa'i nga rgyal can dang ni //
T02TD1348E:7a-16: chags pas bag med g-yo can gyi ni mi la ni //
T02TD1348E:7a-17: gang zhig rgyal ba'i bka' yis thar pa'i 'bras bu ster //
T02TD1348E:7a-18: bla ma'i zhal gyis de nyid byin la ma byin pa'o //
T02TD1348E:7a-19: gang gi yid kyi rang bzhin gang gis shes na ni //
T02TD1348E:7a-20: ston pa de yis de la rang gi zhal sbyin no //
T02TD1348E:7a-21: gang zhig dag pa'i slob ma'i rang bzhin shes pa yi //
T02TD1348E:7a-22: mngon shes dang ldan bla ma gang yang yod ma yin //
T02TD1348E:7a-23: ma dag pa yi sems la bla ma'i 'dod pa'i zhal //
T02TD1348E:7a-24: rims nad rab rgyas rnams la mar gyi btung ba bzhin //
T02TD1348E:7a-25: byin nas rang gi lus la 'chi pa chen por byed //
T02TD1348E:7a-26: bde bas 'khrul pa bzhin du blo gros nyams pa la //
T02TD1348E:7a-27: gang zhig sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan mnyam pa'i bde ba'i rgyur //
T02TD1348E:7a-28: rang gi sems ni so sor snang ba tsam du bsgom //
T02TD1348E:7a-29: dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal ster ba de nyid ni //
T02TD1348E:7a-30: rang gi sems kyi skyon gyis bdud du skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:7a-31: rdo rje dag gis sprul pa'i gzugs rnams du ma ni //
T02TD1348E:7a-32: sdig pa'i stobs kyis khyad par du ni rgud pa ste //
T02TD1348E:7a-33: gshin rje'i gnas ni gdug pa'i 'khor gyis yongs gang ba //
T02TD1348E:7a-34: gshin rje khros pas rdo rje'i me ni sbyin pa'o //
T02TD1348E:7a-35: de phyir bla ma dang ni rgyal pa'i dbang po'i gzugs //
T02TD1348E:7a-36: rnam par ma dag blo yis bsten par mi bya'o //
T02TD1348E:7a-37: dper na rgyal po'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor rnams kyis //
T02TD1348E:7b-0: dga' dang khro bas bde dang sdug @7b bsngal ster ba bzhin //
T02TD1348E:7b-1: ma dag sems kyis 'di ni shi bar gyur pa na //
T02TD1348E:7b-2: gshin rje'i khro bo'i gdong pa rab tu gtum pa dang //
T02TD1348E:7b-3: rdo rje me ni smin pa mi bzad mthong nas ni //
T02TD1348E:7b-4: nyon mongs kha yis ha ha'i sgra ni smra bar byed //
T02TD1348E:7b-5: sngon du bsags pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rab tu rgyas //
T02TD1348E:7b-6: khyod kyis 'dir ni nges par longs spyod pa ru gyis //
T02TD1348E:7b-7: bla ma la sogs 'gyod par byas dang bag med dang //
T02TD1348E:7b-8: sdang ba khyod kyis nga yi bka' la ci zhig byed //
T02TD1348E:7b-9: 'dod pa'i blo gros dpal ldan rdo rje can gyis ni //
T02TD1348E:7b-10: mi bzad dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal lung las ma gsungs sam //
T02TD1348E:7b-11: sdig pa'i stobs kyis rab tu khyab pa dag tu 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:7b-12: sdang ba khyod ni ci yi phyir na sdig pa byed //
T02TD1348E:7b-13: srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyis dman slob ma rnam dag pa //
T02TD1348E:7b-14: gang gi bka' yis thar pa'i go 'phang 'gro bar 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:7b-15: rab zhi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dpal ldan bla ma de //
T02TD1348E:7b-16: 'khor ba'i rgyu ru khyod kyis kyang ni 'dor byed dam ;
T02TD1348E:7b-17: / gshin rje'i bka' yis khro bo'i 'khor rnams kyis bzung ste //
T02TD1348E:7b-18: rab tu 'dar zhing gshin rje me rab gtum pa yi //
T02TD1348E:7b-19: smin par zhugs shing sog le dang ni rtse gsum gyis //
T02TD1348E:7b-20: blo gros rnam par nyams la gcod dang 'bigs par byed //
T02TD1348E:7b-21: slob ma dmus long de ni 'di ru ngo mtshar med //
T02TD1348E:7b-22: mig dang bcas pa'i bla ma long ba ngo mtshar che //
T02TD1348E:7b-23: rgyud rnams thos nas nor dang 'dod chags la zhen pa //
T02TD1348E:7b-24: de la yang ni nges par ston pa'i zhal med do //
T02TD1348E:7b-25: rgyal srid dpal ni ma lus rnam par spangs nas su //
T02TD1348E:7b-26: dpag med sangs rgyas rnams kyis byang chub yang dag bsten //
T02TD1348E:7b-27: skal ldan yon tan rnams kyis de ni nges par lhag / de bas rgyal ba rnams kyis nam yang mi 'dor ro //
T02TD1348E:7b-28: bde ba rnam par ma nyams thar pa'i dpal de ni //
T02TD1348E:7b-29: bor nas yan lag bzang po'i na chung dag la mos //
T02TD1348E:7b-30: sngon du bsags pa'i las ni nges par drag po ste ;
T02TD1348E:7b-31: / gang gis bdud rtsi bor nas dug ni 'thung bar byed //
T02TD1348E:7b-32: gzhan dag rnams ni bud med lus kyi 'dod chags zhen //
T02TD1348E:7b-33: lus po sbyin par byas nas nor ni 'dzin par byed //
T02TD1348E:7b-34: shin tu bsod pa'i zas la zhen pa'i nya bzhin du //
T02TD1348E:7b-35: skad cig bde ba'i rgyu yis rab tu nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:8a-1: ze gang gis rang gzugs pags pa'i rang bzhin gyi //
T02TD1348E:8a-2: dga' ma la ni so sor brten pa'i don dag tu //
T02TD1348E:8a-3: 'jug ngogs dag tu song nas slar yang 'ongs nas ni //
T02TD1348E:8a-4: gzugs brnyan 'dod ma de ni mdzes ma mos pa med //
T02TD1348E:8a-5: de bzhin du ni rgyal ba'i sprul pa'i sku dag la //
T02TD1348E:8a-6: 'jug ngogs la brten rang gi don 'dod du ma dang //
T02TD1348E:8a-7: 'khor ba'i bde ba so sor zhen cing chags pa can //
T02TD1348E:8a-8: bstan pa'i rtags la gus byed rnams kyis mchod mi byed //
T02TD1348E:8a-9: gzhan dag kyang ni 'dod pa'i dngos grub dag la zhen //
T02TD1348E:8a-10: pri ya gang dang n+ya gro dha 'og gangs kyi gnas //
T02TD1348E:8a-11: 'jigs byed ri dang 'jug ngogs dang ni gzhan dag la //
T02TD1348E:8a-12: lam las rnam par nyams pa rnams ni ltung bar 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:8a-13: bram ze rnams la rang nor ma lus byin nas ni //
T02TD1348E:8a-14: nyi ma zla ba gza' yis zin pa lhung bar byed //
T02TD1348E:8a-15: thub par dka' ba'i bdud kyi tshogs kyis rnam par rmongs //
T02TD1348E:8a-16: 'khor ba'i 'brog tu lam ni rnam par nyams pa yin //
T02TD1348E:8a-17: mi rnams gang zhig bla ma dam pa'i zhal dman pas //
T02TD1348E:8a-18: mi bzad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par brnag bzod cing //
T02TD1348E:8a-19: lam ngan yang dag 'dres pa'i dbang gis rnam nyams te //
T02TD1348E:8a-20: dper na dgon par zhugs pa'i ded dpon dang mtshungs so ;
T02TD1348E:8a-21: / des na bla ma thar pa'i lam ni ster ba po //
T02TD1348E:8a-22: slob ma yis ni shin tu gus pas bsten bya ste //
T02TD1348E:8a-23: chung ma dang ni bu dang g-yo ba ma lus dang //
T02TD1348E:8a-24: lus dang ngag dang yid ni g-yo ba med pas so //
T02TD1348E:8a-25: thun mchams [*mtshams?] gsum du shin tu rnam par dag pa yis //
T02TD1348E:8a-26: kha dang lag pa rkang pa dag ni khrus byas te //
T02TD1348E:8a-27: me tog yang dag blangs nas bla ma'i spyan sngar ni //
T02TD1348E:8a-28: rgyal ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu zlum por bya //
T02TD1348E:8a-29: bla ma'i zhabs kyi chu skyes me tog gis mchod cing //
T02TD1348E:8a-30: shin tu gus pas spyi bo lag pas phyag bya'o //
T02TD1348E:8a-31: bla ma'i zhal nas bka' ni rab tu thos nas su //
T02TD1348E:8a-32: sa la 'khod de rang gi khyim du 'gro bar bya //
T02TD1348E:8a-33: bla ma dag gi spyan sngar rkang pa brkyang ba dang //
T02TD1348E:8a-34: gdug pa'i kha yis rab tu brjod pa dag dang ni //
T02TD1348E:8a-35: g-yan pa 'phrug dang tsug tsug dang ni bzhad gad dang //
T02TD1348E:8a-36: skyes bu gzhan gyi skyon brjod gtam ni mi bya'o //
T02TD1348E:8b-0: lam bzangs shes pa sngon du 'gro bar mi bya @8b ste ;
T02TD1348E:8b-1: / gnang ba blangs nas mi shes pa la 'gro bar bya //
T02TD1348E:8b-2: bla mas byin pa lag pa gnyis kyis blang bya zhing //
T02TD1348E:8b-3: rang gis 'bul na spyi bo yis ni phyag bya'o //
T02TD1348E:8b-4: bla ma mgron nas byon 'dir shin tu gus pa yis //
T02TD1348E:8b-5: phrag dog yongs su spangs pa'i rgyu ru sdug ma ni //
T02TD1348E:8b-6: bde ba ster ba'i don du dga' bar byas nas ni //
T02TD1348E:8b-7: rang gi phyag rgya rab tu sbyangs te dbul bar bya //
T02TD1348E:8b-8: ji ltar rang gi sems ni skyo bar mi 'gyur bar //
T02TD1348E:8b-9: ma 'ongs pa ru de ni yongs su smin par bya //
T02TD1348E:8b-10: sems ni rab tu skyo bas dam tshig nyams pa nyid //
T02TD1348E:8b-11: nyams pa'i dbang gis dmyal ba dag tu rab tu 'jug / de bzhin bu yi chung ma bu mo sring mo dang //
T02TD1348E:8b-12: sgyug mo la sogs dang ni rigs ldan khyo med ma //
T02TD1348E:8b-13: mnyam pa'i bde ba'i don du blo rgyas slob ma yis //
T02TD1348E:8b-14: rim gyis rim gyis de rnams yongs su sbyin par bya //
T02TD1348E:8b-15: dag cing bzhin ldan khyo med rnams dang rigs ldan ma //
T02TD1348E:8b-16: bla ma'i zhabs gnyis la ni ma lus dbul bya zhing //
T02TD1348E:8b-17: dbang bdun gyis ni mngon par dbang ni bskur rnams la //
T02TD1348E:8b-18: ji ltar rjes su mthun la chags pa'i don du'o //
T02TD1348E:8b-19: de bzhin 'dir ni rigs ldan khyo med bsten bya ba //
T02TD1348E:8b-20: ji ltar chags pas mngal du 'dzin par mi 'gyur bya //
T02TD1348E:8b-21: mngal nas 'dod min skye bo'i kha na ma tho ba ;
T02TD1348E:8b-22: / skye bo'i kha na ma thos 'jig rten pha rol nyams //
T02TD1348E:8b-23: chags pa 'dod cing gti mug dbang du gyur pa la //
T02TD1348E:8b-24: de phyir khyo med rigs ldan dag ni sbyin mi bya //
T02TD1348E:8b-25: khro ba'i sems dang bcas shing chang mi 'thung ba dang //
T02TD1348E:8b-26: ngang tshul mi shes pa dang nor ni med pa la //
T02TD1348E:8b-27: nor gyis rnyed sla 'gag pa med pa'i smad 'tshong ma //
T02TD1348E:8b-28: bsod nams mang po'i rgyu ru de rnams sbyin par bya //
T02TD1348E:8b-29: rtag pa'i dngos grub rgyu ru yang dag gsang ba ni //
T02TD1348E:8b-30: slob dpon chen po'i go 'phang gnas la dbul bar bya //
T02TD1348E:8b-31: bza' bca' yon tan brgyad 'gyur mar mes 'bras bu ster //
T02TD1348E:8b-32: mar me brgyad 'gyur shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chang //
T02TD1348E:8b-33: chang gi brgyad 'gyur na chung ma la rab sbyor te //
T02TD1348E:8b-34: de phyir 'dod pa'i sbyin pa nges par khyad par 'phags //
T02TD1348E:8b-35: bza' bca' sha dang ldan pa phyag rgya bzang mo dang //
T02TD1348E:8b-36: dkon pa rnyed pa rtag par bla ma la dbul bya //
T02TD1348E:9a-0: mal stan dag dang na bza' dang ni byug pa @9a * //
T02TD1348E:9a-2: / khyad par 'phags pa rang gi rje la dbul bar bya //
T02TD1348E:9a-3: dngos grub dag la chags pas bla ma'i spyan snga ru //
T02TD1348E:9a-4: blo gros rgyas pa rnams kyis ngan pa rang gis blang //
T02TD1348E:9a-5: rang gi khyim na bzhugs pa'i phyag rgya med pa na //
T02TD1348E:9a-6: rang gi phyag rgya la ni brten par mi bya'o //
T02TD1348E:9a-7: shes rab dbang gis mngon par dbang ni bskur rnams la //
T02TD1348E:9a-8: dpal ldan ston pa ru ni yang dag gnas rnams kyis //
T02TD1348E:9a-9: chang rnams nges par shes rab rang bzhin yin pas na //
T02TD1348E:9a-10: shes rab rnam par dman pas 'dir ni btung ma bya //
T02TD1348E:9a-11: btung ba'i brtul zhugs don du dag rung ma dag rung ;
T02TD1348E:9a-12: / rang gi 'khor lo la ni phyag rgya gzung bar 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:9a-13: rgyal ba mchog gis dbang bskur ting 'dzin don dag las //
T02TD1348E:9a-14: dbang gi don du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sems //
T02TD1348E:9a-15: yan lag dkar zhing bcu gnyis lo lon gzhon nu ma //
T02TD1348E:9a-16: de bzhin gzhan dag skye bo'i lo ni nyi shu ma //
T02TD1348E:9a-17: dam tshig ldan zhing bu ma btsas pa gzung bya ste //
T02TD1348E:9a-18: dbang gi don du bla ma dag gis bka' stsal pa //
T02TD1348E:9a-19: sdang dang nad pa skal ba ngan dang ma dul dang //
T02TD1348E:9a-20: khengs shing rdzas la brkam pa dang ni rtsod 'dod dang //
T02TD1348E:9a-21: bla mar mi gus gzhan dag la ni sun 'don ma //
T02TD1348E:9a-22: 'jigs pa ster ba mo de sbrul bzhin spang bar bya //
T02TD1348E:9a-23: ting 'dzin rgyu ru mnyam pa'i bde ba ster mdzad ma //
T02TD1348E:9a-24: dam tshig la zhugs rgan pa'i bud med mchog yin gyi //
T02TD1348E:9a-25: gang zhig sdug bsngal ster zhing mnyam pa'i bde 'joms ma //
T02TD1348E:9a-26: dam tshig rab dman bu mo gzhon nu ma nyid ma yin no //
T02TD1348E:9a-27: mkhris pa'i rims la mkhris pas zhi bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1348E:9a-28: rgun 'brum la sogs med pa'i sngon du mchog yin gyi //
T02TD1348E:9a-29: rab tu zhi ba'i mkhris pa skyed par byed pa'o //
T02TD1348E:9a-30: smin pa mngar ba dri zhim ta la ma yin no //
T02TD1348E:9a-31: slob mas rang gi phyag rgya bla mar phul ba ni //
T02TD1348E:9a-32: de ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes su chags byas la //
T02TD1348E:9a-33: slar yang bla mas slob ma la ni de sbyin bya //
T02TD1348E:9a-34: gzhan dag tu ni slob ma'i skye bos bsten bya min //
T02TD1348E:9a-35: gang yang slob ma'i yan lag bla mas ma gnang ba //
T02TD1348E:9a-36: rtag par slob ma rnams kyis spyi bos de la 'dud //
T02TD1348E:9a-37: rtag pa'i dngos grub 'dod pas bla ma'i bka' yis ni //
T02TD1348E:9b-0: mnyam pa'i bde ba ster mdzad bsten bya @9b bsten mi bya //
T02TD1348E:9b-1: phyag rgya rab tu sbyor la rnam dag bde bas ni //
T02TD1348E:9b-2: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms par byed pa thob 'gyur te //
T02TD1348E:9b-3: skye ba 'di ru rang gi lus kyi bdud 'joms par //
T02TD1348E:9b-4: 'gyur ba de ni 'di ru shin tu ngo mtshar che //
T02TD1348E:9b-5: gang rnams drin gyis dngos grub bzang por 'gyur ba dang //
T02TD1348E:9b-6: gang rnams drin gyis yang dag rdzu 'phrul 'gyur ba dang //
T02TD1348E:9b-7: gang rnams drin gyis bde ba rab tu skye ba dang //
T02TD1348E:9b-8: gang rnams drin gyis srid pa'i me las grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:9b-9: phyag rgya de rnams kun la rab tu mang du mchod //
T02TD1348E:9b-10: phyag rgya de rnams kun ni mang du bsten par bya //
T02TD1348E:9b-11: phyag rgya de rnams kun la mang du tshim par bya //
T02TD1348E:9b-12: phyag rgya de rnams kun la mang du phyag bya zhing //
T02TD1348E:9b-13: phyag rgya de rnams kun ni rgyal ba'i yum yin te //
T02TD1348E:9b-14: phyag rgya de rnams kun ni thub pa'i lcam mo yin //
T02TD1348E:9b-15: phyag rgya de rnams kun ni rgyal ba'i sras mo ste //
T02TD1348E:9b-16: phyag rgya de rnams kun ni rgyal ba'i tsha mo'o //
T02TD1348E:9b-17: phyag rgya de rnams kun ni bde gshegs thugs sdud ma //
T02TD1348E:9b-18: phyag rgya de rnams kun ni bu rnams bde ster ma //
T02TD1348E:9b-19: phyag rgya de rnams kun ni dgra rnams 'jigs ster ma //
T02TD1348E:9b-20: phyag rgya de rnams kun ni rgyal ba'i rdo rje'i khyim //
T02TD1348E:9b-21: phyag rgya de rnams kun la rang gi bla ma bas //
T02TD1348E:9b-22: lhag par mchod cing spyi bo yis ni phyag bya zhing //
T02TD1348E:9b-23: ji ltar rang gi nus pas 'dod pa gnas pas na //
T02TD1348E:9b-24: bu bzangs rnams kyis nam yang dor bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1348E:9b-25: 'dod chags gang nyid kyis ni sems can ltung byed pa'i //
T02TD1348E:9b-26: de nyid kyis ni rnal 'byor pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:9b-27: gang zhig dug nyid kyis ni sems can 'chi byed de //
T02TD1348E:9b-28: dug sngags shes pas de nyid kyis ni nad 'joms byed //
T02TD1348E:9b-29: dpal ldan tshangs par spyod pa bud med la sbyor ba //
T02TD1348E:9b-30: bla na med pa'i rgyud las dor bar ma gsungs so //
T02TD1348E:9b-31: dug gi de nyid smra bas dug gis dbang po zos //
T02TD1348E:9b-32: 'on te ma zos na ni grags par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1348E:9b-33: gnyid log pa dang sangs pa dug ni mi shes pa ;
T02TD1348E:9b-34: / dper na bu yi lus la sbrul gyi mche bas btab //
T02TD1348E:9b-35: de bzhin du ni yid bzhin nor bu byang chub sems //
T02TD1348E:9b-36: de nyid med la bud med bha ga'i sbrul gyis btab //
T02TD1348E:9b-37: sngags pa rnams la 'pho ba'i skad cig zhi byed min //
T02TD1348E:9b-38: skye ba du ma'i mtha' ru sdug bsngal ster ba'o //
T02TD1348E:10a-1: ka'i dug gi mche ba langs pa na //
T02TD1348E:10a-2: rab tu khros pas ji lta bur na zhi bar 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:10a-3: ji ltar rdo yi gos ni me yis gdungs pa na //
T02TD1348E:10a-4: zhu bar 'gyur gyi thal ba ru ni mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1348E:10a-5: de bzhin chu skyes sbyor bas mchog gi byang chub sems //
T02TD1348E:10a-6: rtsol ldan rnams la 'di ni rang bzhin gyis dag 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:10a-7: me dang dngul chu dag ni rtag par dgra nyid do //
T02TD1348E:10a-8: me med pa yis kyang ni dngul chu mi 'ching ste //
T02TD1348E:10a-9: dngul chu ma bcings pa yis khams rnams 'bigs mi 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:10a-10: khams rnams ma phug pa yis gser du 'gyur ba min //
T02TD1348E:10a-11: gser du ma gyur pa las rdzas ni mi 'phel lo //
T02TD1348E:10a-12: nor gyis rnam par dman pas yul gyi longs spyod med //
T02TD1348E:10a-13: longs spyod ma rtogs sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad pa ru //
T02TD1348E:10a-14: bcud len smra ba rnams kyi lus la 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1348E:10a-15: bud med skye gnas dang sbyor 'pho ba med pa yis //
T02TD1348E:10a-16: de bzhin gnyis po yang ni dgra chen nyid yin no ;
T02TD1348E:10a-17: / sbyor ba ma rtogs g-yo ba'i sems ni mi 'ching ste //
T02TD1348E:10a-18: sems ma bcings pa yis ni lus la 'bigs pa med //
T02TD1348E:10a-19: ma phug pa yis lus la dag pa'i spyod pa med //
T02TD1348E:10a-20: ma dag spyod pa yis ni bde ba mi ster ro //
T02TD1348E:10a-21: bde ba ma rtogs 'gro drug sdug bsngal mi bzad par //
T02TD1348E:10a-22: bag med pa yis sngags pa ngan pa rnams la 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1348E:10a-23: bud med sbyor ba dman pas thar pa'i bde ba med //
T02TD1348E:10a-24: bud med sbyor ba dman kyang srid me'i sdug bsngal med //
T02TD1348E:10a-25: de bas rang gi blo yis legs par dpyad nas ni //
T02TD1348E:10a-26: sngags pas gang la mos pa yang ni blang bar bgyis //
T02TD1348E:10a-27: shing las me dang chu yang chu shel dag las so //
T02TD1348E:10a-28: zho las mar dang rdo ba las ni lcags kyi rigs //
T02TD1348E:10a-29: bud med skye gnas sbyor las bde ba ma nyams par //
T02TD1348E:10a-30: skal ldan thabs kyis sbyor bas de ni blang bar gyis //
T02TD1348E:10a-31: rgyud kyi thog ma dbus mtha' la gnas 'dod pa ni //
T02TD1348E:10a-32: dge bar gsungs pa bya mi yi ni zhal nyid do //
T02TD1348E:10a-33: sbas pa'i yid bzhin nor bu brtag par dka' ba ni //
T02TD1348E:10a-34: bla ma dam pa slu ba po yis zin mi 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:10a-35: rdo rje bslang ba dag ni dang por gsungs pa ste //
T02TD1348E:10a-36: rdo rje me la srog zhugs pas ni gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1348E:10b-0: dpal ldan mi 'gyur byang chub sems ni gsum pa @10b yin ;
T02TD1348E:10b-1: ;'di dag nyid ni dge ba'i brtul zhugs chen po'o //
T02TD1348E:10b-2: 'di ltar nyams pa'i bde ba dge ba ma yin zhing //
T02TD1348E:10b-3: 'di ltar bstan bcos tshig ni dge ba ma yin no //
T02TD1348E:10b-4: 'di ltar gtsug lag khang gnas dge ba ma yin te //
T02TD1348E:10b-5: 'di ltar lus la sdug bsngal dge ba ma yin no //
T02TD1348E:10b-6: mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la rab tu chags pa rnams //
T02TD1348E:10b-7: gang zhig 'dod chags bral ba 'dir ni chags par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:10b-8: 'dod chags rab tu spangs pas de nas nges par ni //
T02TD1348E:10b-9: chags pa dang bral sbyor ba yang ni ring du 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:10b-10: thabs kyi lag tu yang ni rdo rje dril bu dang //
T02TD1348E:10b-11: ci'i phyir shes rab lag tu rdo rje 'di zhe na //
T02TD1348E:10b-12: bdud rnams gzhom pa'i phyir dang bde ba bsten phyir te //
T02TD1348E:10b-13: tshul khrims 'dzin pas mtshan ma shes par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1348E:10b-14: rgyal po bcu bas lhag pa'i yon tan dge slong ste //
T02TD1348E:10b-15: dge slong bcu bas lhag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa bzang //
T02TD1348E:10b-16: dpal ldan tshangs par spyod dang ting nge 'dzin dang ni //
T02TD1348E:10b-17: byams pa la sogs dang ni de nyid nges pas so //
T02TD1348E:10b-18: dpag med bskal par theg pa ngan pa'i blo gros kyis //
T02TD1348E:10b-19: sbyin pa la sogs byin zhing brtul zhugs spyad na yang //
T02TD1348E:10b-20: bde gshegs rab 'khrungs sa 'dir rgyal po dge slong dag / gnas 'di la ni 'di ltar rab tu ma zhugs so //
T02TD1348E:10b-21: nyan thos theg pa nyid ni theg pa ma yin te //
T02TD1348E:10b-22: rang rgyal 'di ltar rgyal ba'i sa ni min par gsungs //
T02TD1348E:10b-23: dpal ldan rdo rje'i theg pa rgyal ba'i theg pa nyid //
T02TD1348E:10b-24: de yang gnyis las theg pa bar dang tha mar byed //
T02TD1348E:10b-25: de phyir bla na med pa'i theg pa bor nas ni //
T02TD1348E:10b-26: 'dod pa'i bla med byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1348E:10b-27: dper na bug bcas gru yis rgya mtsho'i pha rol du //
T02TD1348E:10b-28: rin thang med pa'i nor bu'i phyir ni mi bgrod do //
T02TD1348E:10b-29: rang don la zhugs 'dod chags kyis ni bag med pa //
T02TD1348E:10b-30: slob mas rang gi chung ma ji srid ma phul ba //
T02TD1348E:10b-31: de srid rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bla mas stsol lam ci //
T02TD1348E:10b-32: rnam par nyams pa'i blo yis 'di dag mi shes so //
T02TD1348E:10b-33: rnon po yis ni gser dang shel gyi rin po che //
T02TD1348E:10b-34: smyug ma yis ni go shirsha yi tsandan te //
T02TD1348E:10b-35: phran tshegs rang gi chung ma yis ni sangs rgyas yum //
T02TD1348E:10b-36: de yis rab tu rnyed na 'di ru ci zhig skyon //
T02TD1348E:11a-0: @11a * // lam bzangs btang nas dgon pa dag tu 'jug byed cing //
T02TD1348E:11a-1: bde ba bzang po btang nas sdug bsngal len par byed //
T02TD1348E:11a-2: ae ma blo gros phyin ci log gi skye bo rnams //
T02TD1348E:11a-3: dbang po la sogs kyis kyang bsten par mi nus pa //
T02TD1348E:11a-4: dpag med bskal ba'i bar du mi 'gyur bde ba ni //
T02TD1348E:11a-5: bla ma dam pa bsten pa rnams kyis thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:11a-6: yang na thob nas 'di ltar nyams par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD1348E:11a-7: nges par ma bsten lhag ma dang bcas rnam par nyams //
T02TD1348E:11a-8: sems kyi bag med dbang gis dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal te //
T02TD1348E:11a-9: sems kyi drin gyis kyang ni thar pa bde ba'o //
T02TD1348E:11a-10: rmi lam gzugs brnyan de ni su zhig gis byas te //
T02TD1348E:11a-11: bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal gang gi drin gyis thob //
T02TD1348E:11a-12: bdud ni rang gi sems te bdud gzhan yod ma yin //
T02TD1348E:11a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa de yang bde gshegs gzhan na med //
T02TD1348E:11a-14: bdud rnams bcom zhing rnam par rgyal ba'i thub pa ni //
T02TD1348E:11a-15: sems kyis sems dag so so ru ni sad pa nyid //
T02TD1348E:11a-16: sems la cung zad srid pa gang zhig len pa min //
T02TD1348E:11a-17: dor ba ma yin 'phel zhing 'grib pa yang ma yin //
T02TD1348E:11a-18: sems la sems nyid so sor snang ba tsam du ni //
T02TD1348E:11a-19: khams gsum pa ni dngos po stong pas gnas par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:11a-20: ngo bo med pas stong par ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
T02TD1348E:11a-21: 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas la rab tu zhugs //
T02TD1348E:11a-22: shes rab lus ldan snying rje dang ni tha mi dad //
T02TD1348E:11a-23: byang chub sems nyid de ni yongs su bsgom par bya //
T02TD1348E:11a-24: shes rab yan lag bral zhing snying rjes tha dad na //
T02TD1348E:11a-25: mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas la nam yang 'gro ba min //
T02TD1348E:11a-26: shes rab la zhugs snying rje rnam par spangs pa ni //
T02TD1348E:11a-27: rin chen sems ni rtag pa la ni rab mi gnas //
T02TD1348E:11a-28: shes rab rnam thar yin la thabs ni snying rje'o //
T02TD1348E:11a-29: de gnyis dbus su gnyis su med pa gsungs pa ste //
T02TD1348E:11a-30: rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas bde ba dam pa dpag med pa //
T02TD1348E:11a-31: 'khor ba las ni grol 'gyur smon lam tsam yin no //
T02TD1348E:11a-32: 'jug pa'i sems dang smon pa yi ni sems nyid dag / dbye ba cung zhig dag ni de gnyis dag la yod //
T02TD1348E:11a-33: 'gro bar gnas pa dang ni 'gro ba nyid yin te //
T02TD1348E:11a-34: gang yang bye brag dag ni sems kyi dbang nyid do //
T02TD1348E:11b-0: 'khor ba'i bde ba @11b smon pa yi ni sems yin te //
T02TD1348E:11b-1: dpag med bskal pa ru ni gzhan gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD1348E:11b-2: ma nyams bde ba 'jug pa yi ni sems yin la //
T02TD1348E:11b-3: mya ngan 'das pa'i mthar thug de bzhin bdag gi don //
T02TD1348E:11b-4: dpag med rgyu ru dge slong gis ni gang zhig bsrung //
T02TD1348E:11b-5: bde ba 'dod pa bde phyir gang zhig tshol bar byed //
T02TD1348E:11b-6: de gnyis dbus su gnyis med sbyor ba rin po che //
T02TD1348E:11b-7: gang zhig len pa de ni mi zad yang dag zhugs //
T02TD1348E:11b-8: sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis bsdus rgyud las gsungs pa'i //
T02TD1348E:11b-9: lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar mi bya zhes su grags //
T02TD1348E:11b-10: de nyid myang 'das 'bras bu rab tu ster mdzad ma ;
T02TD1348E:11b-11: / shes rab la sogs rgyud las rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs //
T02TD1348E:11b-12: 'dod lus ma la chags par zhen pa 'dod can dang //
T02TD1348E:11b-13: dge slong sgyid lug can ni gtsug lag khang gnas pa //
T02TD1348E:11b-14: bde ba yi ni don du gang zhig las byed pa //
T02TD1348E:11b-15: de la rigs pas rgyal ba rnams kyi rdo rje'i tshig / skyon dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya de ni yongs spangs la //
T02TD1348E:11b-16: phyag rgya bzang mo bde ba'i don du gzung bar bya //
T02TD1348E:11b-17: de med na ni lag pa'i sbyor ba'i phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1348E:11b-18: skye bo rnams la rang dbang yid bzhin nor bu mtshungs //
T02TD1348E:11b-19: gang zhig sems la rjes gnas mnyam pa'i bde ster dang //
T02TD1348E:11b-20: nyes skyon dang bral srid pa sdug bsngal 'joms byed ma //
T02TD1348E:11b-21: du ma'i rnam pa'i yul gyi tha dad ma yin pa //
T02TD1348E:11b-22: de 'dir skye bo mkhas pas ci phyir 'dor bar byed //
T02TD1348E:11b-23: gang dag su zhig 'dod pa'i na chung bzang mo ni //
T02TD1348E:11b-24: dga' bas rgyal ba'i rdo rje mchod par ster byed ma //
T02TD1348E:11b-25: bde ba ma nyams de la byang chub bar du ni //
T02TD1348E:11b-26: rdo rje 'dzin pa du ma yang dag mchod par bya //
T02TD1348E:11b-27: phyogs gcig tu ni dam tshig dag la rab zhugs ma //
T02TD1348E:11b-28: skal ldan bdag go zhes ni skul zhing smra byed de //
T02TD1348E:11b-29: 'dod pa'i dngos grub rgyu ru rdo rje mchod mi byed //
T02TD1348E:11b-30: nyams pa'i sems de dmyal ba ru ni rab tu 'gro //
T02TD1348E:11b-31: lo ni bcu gnyis lon pa'i bu mo dkar mo nyid //
T02TD1348E:11b-32: shin tu rnam dag sems ldan slob mas rnyed nas ni //
T02TD1348E:11b-33: shin tu gus pas legs par mchod pa nyid byas la //
T02TD1348E:11b-34: bla med dbang phyir bla ma la ni dbul bar bya //
T02TD1348E:11b-35: ston pa de yis de dang lhan cig dbang ster te //
T02TD1348E:11b-36: slob ma la ni bla med byang chub rgyu ru de //
T02TD1348E:12a-1: dbang bskur bla ma'i zhal dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD1348E:12a-2: bzhi pa gzhan yang de dgyes pa yis ster ba mdzad //
T02TD1348E:12a-3: bla ma'i drin dag gis ni smig rgyu la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1348E:12a-4: khyad par 'phags pa'i lam la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:12a-5: yan lag drug gi sbyor bas rgyal dbang gzugs brnyan dang //
T02TD1348E:12a-6: phyag rgya rab tu sbyor bas rnam dag bde ba la //
T02TD1348E:12a-7: yan lag bzang mo chags pa la ni rab tu zhe na //
T02TD1348E:12a-8: gtso bo bsgrub par bya phyir de ni btsal bar bya //
T02TD1348E:12a-9: phyogs gcig gnas la rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yis //
T02TD1348E:12a-10: dngos grub ster ma de ni mang du mchod par bya //
T02TD1348E:12a-11: gtsang la rnam par dben pa'i sa yi phyogs dag dang //
T02TD1348E:12a-12: rgyal ba'am ni zhi ba'i bde 'byung gnas dag tu //
T02TD1348E:12a-13: rtag par rgyal ba mchod phyir dri chen dri chu dang //
T02TD1348E:12a-14: chu la sogs pa rnams kyis byug pa byas nas ni //
T02TD1348E:12a-15: snying ga lte mgrin dpral ba spyi gtsug gsang ba la //
T02TD1348E:12a-16: rigs kyi lha mo rnams ni rab tu dgod par bya //
T02TD1348E:12a-17: de bzhin mig la sogs pa rigs ni drug pa ste //
T02TD1348E:12a-18: stong pa la sogs sa bon sna tshogs rim pas so //
T02TD1348E:12a-19: de bzhin mchod pa lnga sogs rnams kyis mchod byas la //
T02TD1348E:12a-20: de nas chu skyes su ni rdo rje rab tu gzhug / yan lag drug gi sbyor bas smig rgyu la sogs pa //
T02TD1348E:12a-21: ye shes dag gi me ni rab tu bzhengs par bya //
T02TD1348E:12a-22: rim gyis rnal 'byor stobs kyis khyad par 'phags pa yi //
T02TD1348E:12a-23: rgyal ba rnams ni shes rab me yis rab tu bsreg / de rnams rab bsregs zla ba'i gzugs ni bzhu ba las //
T02TD1348E:12a-24: bdud rtsi bzang po gang 'dzag de ni rdo rje can //
T02TD1348E:12a-25: de ni dbang gi dus su shin tu rnam dag blos //
T02TD1348E:12a-26: thig le gsum gyi mtha' ru skad cig gcig la nyid //
T02TD1348E:12a-27: shes rab med kyang 'di ltar ri bong can bzhu las //
T02TD1348E:12a-28: gsum pa khyad par dga' ba'i mtha' ru kun nas btsal bar bya //
T02TD1348E:12a-29: 'gro ba'i mgon gcig ston pa gzhan ni yod ma yin //
T02TD1348E:12a-30: khams gsum dag na bde ba khyad 'phags gzhan ni med //
T02TD1348E:12a-31: bde ba mnyam ster dngos grub gzhan ni yod ma yin //
T02TD1348E:12a-32: lus bsrung don du srung ba gzhan ni yod ma yin //
T02TD1348E:12a-33: 'dir ni dkyil 'khor dag dang sku gzugs ting 'dzin med //
T02TD1348E:12a-34: lag pa'i phyag rgya bya ba dang ni gdan rnams med //
T02TD1348E:12b-0: sngags dang gtor ma sbyin sreg cho ga rab @12b gnas dang //
T02TD1348E:12b-1: gshegs su gsol ba rnam par dag pa'i chos la med //
T02TD1348E:12b-2: rang bzhin gyis dag 'gro ba yi ni rje dpon gcig / shes rab me yis gal te rab tu bslangs pas na //
T02TD1348E:12b-3: de yi phyi nas rang gi lus po la ni bdud stobs bzhi //
T02TD1348E:12b-4: de nyid gcig pu yis ni nyams par mdzad pa yin //
T02TD1348E:12b-5: ji srid de ma bzhengs par bde ba ster ba med //
T02TD1348E:12b-6: rab tu bzhengs pas 'dod chags bral nyid 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD1348E:12b-7: gnyis su med pa'i lam gcig 'di ni dka' ba ste //
T02TD1348E:12b-8: ma lus sems can rnams ni lam gnyis dag pas 'gro //
T02TD1348E:12b-9: ma bsdams dbang gis brgya la zin par ma gyur na //
T02TD1348E:12b-10: chu skyes snying por dpal ldan byang chub sems lhung 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:12b-11: phyag rgya'i sems ni shin tu rnam dag shes byas nas //
T02TD1348E:12b-12: de nas chu skyes phyi rol rang gi khas gzung bya //
T02TD1348E:12b-13: ma dag phyag rgya'i chu skyes la gnas rang gi sems //
T02TD1348E:12b-14: ma nyams rnams kyis ma tshor ming med kyis gzung bya //
T02TD1348E:12b-15: myang ba'i don du rnam par nyams pa'i bdud rtsi gang //
T02TD1348E:12b-16: dpal ldan sngags pa rnams la 'chi ba nyams par byed //
T02TD1348E:12b-17: bud med skye gnas sbyor ba'i dbang gis rang gi sems //
T02TD1348E:12b-18: gang zhig skyes bu rnams kyi 'gyur ba mi 'gyur la //
T02TD1348E:12b-19: rgyal bas mchod pa thugs rje che ldan de rnams kyi //
T02TD1348E:12b-20: zhabs gnyis dag la mgo bo yis ni phyag bgyi'o //
T02TD1348E:12b-21: na chung ma la sbyor bas dpal ldan byang chub sems //
T02TD1348E:12b-22: gang zhig bdag dang gzhan gyi don du bsrung mdzad cing //
T02TD1348E:12b-23: nyin dang mtshan du bdag dang gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i //
T02TD1348E:12b-24: de rnams zhabs kyi padma la ni phyag bgyi'o //
T02TD1348E:12b-25: sangs rgyas nyid kyi bde ba dpag med thob na yang //
T02TD1348E:12b-26: sems can rnams kyi don phyir 'dor bar mdzad gyur cing //
T02TD1348E:12b-27: 'khor ba'i nang du rab tu 'jug pa'i dpa' bo ste //
T02TD1348E:12b-28: de rnams zhabs kyi pad mar spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1348E:12b-29: nyin dang mtshan du bsam gtan stobs kyi rim pa yis //
T02TD1348E:12b-30: gang rnams rang gi sems ni rtsa dbus gnas par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:12b-31: mtha' yas gzugs las shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sku //
T02TD1348E:12b-32: de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi rdo rje rtse gcig pa'o //
T02TD1348E:12b-33: thar pa'i bde rgyu dang po yis ni sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1348E:12b-34: gnyis med de ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal nyid do //
T02TD1348E:13a-0: mnga' bdag dus kyi 'khor lo khams gsum la gnas @13a * //
T02TD1348E:13a-2: / mi 'gyur thig le sbyor bas yang dag thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:13a-3: ji ltar gzhon nu ma yi me long nang du ni //
T02TD1348E:13a-4: ma mthong mthong lta'i bra ti se na'i don lta byed //
T02TD1348E:13a-5: de bzhin 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung ba ni //
T02TD1348E:13a-6: de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa yis nam mkhar mthong //
T02TD1348E:13a-7: mngon sum dag tu gzugs ni dngos po stong pa'i phyir //
T02TD1348E:13a-8: dngos po dang ni dngos med de ru med pa yin //
T02TD1348E:13a-9: sgyu ma dang ni rmi lam rdzu 'phul mtshungs pa ni //
T02TD1348E:13a-10: de la 'bras bu yod cing dngos po med pa'o //
T02TD1348E:13a-11: rgyu dang 'bras bu rjes su mtshungs pa'i 'bras bu ni //
T02TD1348E:13a-12: ma skyes chos rnams la ni skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur ;
T02TD1348E:13a-13: / rnam pa kun ldan kun nas rnam par dag pa dang //
T02TD1348E:13a-14: dbang po thams cad dang ldan kun gyi snying gar gnas //
T02TD1348E:13a-15: ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing dag gis //
T02TD1348E:13a-16: sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis kun nas 'dod rdzogs byed //
T02TD1348E:13a-17: de bzhin bsam pa'i dbang gis rdzogs pa de nyid ni //
T02TD1348E:13a-18: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos las skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:13a-19: stong pa yis ni rgyu la gsal bar rgyu yis ni //
T02TD1348E:13a-20: rang gi stong pa la ni nges par rgyas gdab ste //
T02TD1348E:13a-21: phyi dang lus po dag dang gzhan rnams gcig tu ste //
T02TD1348E:13a-22: lta ba drug la gnas dang gzhan rnams slu bar byed //
T02TD1348E:13a-23: mi 'gyur lam nyams rang gi don la gnas pa yi //
T02TD1348E:13a-24: mkhas pa rnams kyis de nyid du ma'i gzhung gis brtags //
T02TD1348E:13a-25: tshangs pa 'am ni seng ge mchog gi dbang phyug gam //
T02TD1348E:13a-26: de bzhin byed po yis ni chos ni gang smras pa //
T02TD1348E:13a-27: rig byed mtha' dag grub mtha'i gzhung dang nges tshig gis //
T02TD1348E:13a-28: mdor bsdus de nyid 'di ru rnam par dpyad par bgyi //
T02TD1348E:13a-29: gal te skye dgu rnams la skyed byed gcig nyid 'dir //
T02TD1348E:13a-30: ji ltar rigs dag 'di ni rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:13a-31: tshad ma dang ni dpe dang tshul gyi dbye ba yis //
T02TD1348E:13a-32: yongs su brtags na rnam par ma thun par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1348E:13a-33: pha gcig dag la nges par bu ni bzhir gyur na //
T02TD1348E:13a-34: bu de rnams la nges par rigs ni gcig yin no //
T02TD1348E:13a-35: de ltar mchog tu 'dod las skyes pa'i mi rnams kyi //
T02TD1348E:13a-36: rigs kyi rnam pa bzhi ru rigs pa yod ma yin //
T02TD1348E:13a-37: ji ltar au dum w'a ra'i shing las skyes pa'i 'bras bu ni //
T02TD1348E:13a-38: rtsa ba dbus dang rtse mo las byung gang zhig rnams //
T02TD1348E:13b-0: gzugs @13b dang rnam par reg bya ro rnams 'dra ba ste //
T02TD1348E:13b-1: de bzhin kha nyid la sogs gnas ni gcig tu 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:13b-2: kha las skyes pa ri bong 'od zer dkar ma yin //
T02TD1348E:13b-3: dpung pa las skyes nyin byed shar dang 'dra ba min //
T02TD1348E:13b-4: brla nas skyes pa ldong ros kha dog dang 'dra min //
T02TD1348E:13b-5: rkang pa las skyes mig sman chen po gnag 'dra min //
T02TD1348E:13b-6: gnyis skyes thams cad ye shes rigs min rgyal rigs ni //
T02TD1348E:13b-7: rgyal po'i rigs las skyes pas dpa' bo rnams ma yin //
T02TD1348E:13b-8: rje'u rigs thams cad phun sum tshogs dang ldan pa yin //
T02TD1348E:13b-9: 'jig rten du ni dmangs rigs las chen mi byed do //
T02TD1348E:13b-10: khams kyi dbye bas bde dang sdug bsngal dngos po dang //
T02TD1348E:13b-11: lung dang rigs pas bsod nams tshogs dang sdig pa dang //
T02TD1348E:13b-12: skye dang 'jig rten mnyam pa nyams su myong ba ste //
T02TD1348E:13b-13: mi rigs rnam pa bzhi ni de ltar 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1348E:13b-14: rdzogs ldan dus su rigs kyi dbye ba yod ma yin //
T02TD1348E:13b-15: gsum ldan 'jug pa gtso bo dang ni 'khor 'gyur ro //
T02TD1348E:13b-16: dus gnyis la ni dngos po nyams par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD1348E:13b-17: gang zhig gnyis ldan dus su rigs dang rigs min nyid //
T02TD1348E:13b-18: de dang ser sna rgyu dang dregs pa nga rgyal dang //
T02TD1348E:13b-19: chags pa zhe sdang gis ni rigs ni ldog par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:13b-20: rigs rnams byas nas rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1348E:13b-21: gzhan na rigs dang rigs min sde 'byung kha dog med //
T02TD1348E:13b-22: byed pa po yi rang lus rim pa ji lta ba //
T02TD1348E:13b-23: kha nyid dang ni dpung pa brla dang rkang pa las //
T02TD1348E:13b-24: bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u dang dmangs rigs skyes gyur na //
T02TD1348E:13b-25: phyugs dang tha ma las skyes de yi gang nas byung //
T02TD1348E:13b-26: tshangs pa'i kha nyid las skyes bram ze grags pa na //
T02TD1348E:13b-27: bram ze mo yang gnas de nyid las yin nam ci //
T02TD1348E:13b-28: gal te 'di dag skye gnas gcig las skyes gyur na //
T02TD1348E:13b-29: ming po dang ni sring mo bag mar rigs ma yin //
T02TD1348E:13b-30: gal te yin na kla klo'i skye bo 'jug par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:13b-31: kla klo 'jug par gyur na rigs ni nyams pas te //
T02TD1348E:13b-32: rigs zad na ni dmyal bar sdug bsngal mi bzad pa //
T02TD1348E:13b-33: rang gi rigs ni 'dzin phyir de dag la 'gyur ro //
T02TD1348E:13b-34: de ltar dpung brla rkang pa las byung rnams la ni //
T02TD1348E:13b-35: gang zhig rang gi rigs ni 'dzin phyir ldog par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:13b-36: de phyir drang srong rigs ni bag ma'i dus dag tu //
T02TD1348E:14a-0: @14a * // 'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pas brtag par byed pa'o //
T02TD1348E:14a-1: du ma sna tshogs rigs dang rnam pa stong phrag pa //
T02TD1348E:14a-2: bag ma len pa'i dus su rnam par brtag par byed //
T02TD1348E:14a-3: gang phyir drang srod rigs ni brtag par byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:14a-4: de phyir mchod 'dod lus las rigs ni ma yin no ;
T02TD1348E:14a-5: / ye shes kyis ni rigs dang rdzu 'phrul dngos grub dang //
T02TD1348E:14a-6: de bzhin khyad par dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1348E:14a-7: de phyir ye shes che 'di rnam par dag pa yin //
T02TD1348E:14a-8: gzhan du na ni rang gi rigs kyis rigs 'gyur min //
T02TD1348E:14a-9: tshangs min skye ba'i gnas ni drang srong rgyas sogs pa //
T02TD1348E:14a-10: skye gnas tshangs pa'i go 'phang rab tu zhugs par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:14a-11: de phyir dka' thub bzang po dor nas rigs kyis ni //
T02TD1348E:14a-12: rnam par dag pa'i lam ni ster bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1348E:14a-13: padma dang ni rin po che dang mu tig dang //
T02TD1348E:14a-14: 'dam dang ri bo dang ni thod pa'i sbyor las 'byung //
T02TD1348E:14a-15: de nyid rnams ni ma lus 'jig rten mchod gnas 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:14a-16: de rnams sngon gyi skye gnas las ni ma yin no //
T02TD1348E:14a-17: kha las chos ni ston par byed cing sgrogs byed pas //
T02TD1348E:14a-18: de phyir bram ze rnams ni kha las skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:14a-19: rgyal rigs rnams ni dpung pas 'khrugs par byed pa ste //
T02TD1348E:14a-20: dpung pa de dag las ni de rnams skye bar 'gyur ;
T02TD1348E:14a-21: / brla yi stobs kyis rje rigs skye bo 'gron por byed //
T02TD1348E:14a-22: de phyir de rnams de las skyes par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1348E:14a-23: rkang pa'i rtsa bar brten par byed par grags pa yis //
T02TD1348E:14a-24: de phyir rkang pa las ni dmangs rigs skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:14a-25: de phyir gzhan rnams rigs kyi dbye ba bco brgyad yin //
T02TD1348E:14a-26: rang gi las kyi rang bzhin las kyi ngo bor skyes //
T02TD1348E:14a-27: 'jig rten gsum du las kyi mthu ni stobs dang ldan //
T02TD1348E:14a-28: gang phyir bram ze yang ni dmangs rigs nyid du 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:14a-29: sgog skya dag dang btsong dang bza' min zos pa dang //
T02TD1348E:14a-30: chang 'thungs nas ni dmangs rigs gnas su 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1348E:14a-31: dka' thub byas nas slar yang bram ze de nyid du //
T02TD1348E:14a-32: 'gyur de de phyir dka' thub khyad par can yin no //
T02TD1348E:14a-33: grog ma dang ni ra ri dag dang sna mtshan dang //
T02TD1348E:14a-34: rgyas ba la sogs drang srong gzhan rnams rab grags pa //
T02TD1348E:14a-35: tshangs pa'i skye gnas min las kyang ni de rnams skyes //
T02TD1348E:14b-0: dka' thub khyad par @14b dag gi drang srong rnams su 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:14b-1: de phyir rang gi rigs kyi dag dang ma dag pa //
T02TD1348E:14b-2: don dam pa yi rgyu yis gang yang med par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:14b-3: zhe sdang dbang gis rigs 'di rab tu 'byung ba ste //
T02TD1348E:14b-4: rang don 'dod ba'i bram zes nor gyi don du byas //
T02TD1348E:14b-5: dag pa'i bram ze mo gang bdag po'i brtul zhugs can //
T02TD1348E:14b-6: skyes bu gzhan ma la ni de yis rten par byed //
T02TD1348E:14b-7: de yi bu ni 'di ru bram zer gyur pa ste //
T02TD1348E:14b-8: de phyir rigs ni ji ltar rim pas ma yin no /
T02TD1348E:14b-9: ` / lus 'di'i snga ma'i rigs kyi thal ba gzhan yin la //
T02TD1348E:14b-10: las kyi dbang las pha yi srog kyang gzhan yin te //
T02TD1348E:14b-11: gzhan du lus dang srog dag gi ni rigs dag kyang //
T02TD1348E:14b-12: bu dang bcas pa su zhig gis ni 'byin par byed //
T02TD1348E:14b-13: gzhan du rigs kyang gal te pha yi yin na ni //
T02TD1348E:14b-14: pha yi pha gang de ni mes po'i yin par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:14b-15: de ltar 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad rang gi rigs //
T02TD1348E:14b-16: gnyis skyes rnams la drang srong rigs gzhan yod ma yin //
T02TD1348E:14b-17: rngon pa bdun yang ri dags dag dang ngur pa dang //
T02TD1348E:14b-18: ngang pa de rnams gnyis skyes su yang slar byung 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:14b-19: gang phyir skye ba gzhan du srog ni las dbang gis //
T02TD1348E:14b-20: yin pa de phyir nang na drang srong rigs med do //
T02TD1348E:14b-21: gnyis skyes tshim nas nam mkha' dang ni sa yi gnas //
T02TD1348E:14b-22: gang yin der ni shi ba tshim par mngon par 'dod //
T02TD1348E:14b-23: zos pa dag kyang ma zhu'i dbang las bag med pa //
T02TD1348E:14b-24: pha yi bag med du 'gyur 'di ni ngo mtshar ro //
T02TD1348E:14b-25: shloka bzhi po 'di lnga 'gyur la med pa //
T02TD1348E:14b-26: chos rje yid bzang rtse pas pan chen rin po che'i phyag dpe gnyis gtugs nas 'gyur bcos mdzad pa na yod pas bar 'dir 'jug go /
T02TD1348E:14b-28: ` / gal te gnyis skyes dang ni pho rog gis zan zos //
T02TD1348E:14b-29: shi ba'i pha ni pha rol tu ni tshim par byed //
T02TD1348E:14b-30: dge ba dang ni mi dge ba yi rgyu mtshan des //
T02TD1348E:14b-31: pha de nyid kyi sngon du bsags pa nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:14b-32: rang gis byin pa rang nyid kyis ni thob 'gyur te //
T02TD1348E:14b-33: gzhan ma rnams kyi sbyin pa bsngos pa'i blo yis min ;
T02TD1348E:14b-34: / bde bar gshegs pas rang gi don du rang sha ni //
T02TD1348E:14b-35: sbyin min de bzhin du yang de rnams nges grol phyir //
T02TD1348E:14b-36: thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyis gzhung kun rnams las ni //
T02TD1348E:14b-37: srog gcod kyis ni grol ba yod pa ma yin no //
T02TD1348E:14b-38: mchod sbyin la ni srog gcod de bzhin smra byed pa //
T02TD1348E:15a-1: skyes rnams kyis mi shes gnas yin no //
T02TD1348E:15a-2: mchod sbyin la ni gsad cing gsod pa gang yang med //
T02TD1348E:15a-3: 'jig rten gsad bya lha ru nges par 'gro med de //
T02TD1348E:15a-4: snying rje dang ni nges par zhi ba dang bral ba'i //
T02TD1348E:15a-5: gnyis skyes skyon can rnams kyi tshig 'di yin par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:15a-6: dbul po'i sdug bsngal dang ni 'dod pa dang bral nas //
T02TD1348E:15a-7: rang gi rtsa lag grogs po yid 'ong bu dang tsha //
T02TD1348E:15a-8: de rnams bde bar 'dod dang bde 'gro 'dod pa na //
T02TD1348E:15a-9: gal te tshig 'di bden yin de rnams sreg par byed //
T02TD1348E:15a-10: bu dang rtsa lag stobs med la sogs shi gyur na //
T02TD1348E:15a-11: du 'bod nas ni dur khrod dag tu phyin pa dang ;
T02TD1348E:15a-12: / shi ba rnams la gang gis chu dang zan sbyin na //
T02TD1348E:15a-13: rmongs pa de yis ji ltar ma skyes la sogs gsod //
T02TD1348E:15a-14: aa shvattha la brten dang til snod sbyin pa dang //
T02TD1348E:15a-15: ba la reg pa dang ni bram ze tshim pa dang //
T02TD1348E:15a-16: gang+g'a'i chu dang bha ra ta ni thos pa ste //
T02TD1348E:15a-17: 'di rnams kyis ni gal te sdig nyams byed 'gyur na ;
T02TD1348E:15a-18: / mkha' 'gro yis ni aa shvattha la brten par byed //
T02TD1348E:15a-19: til mkhan gyis ni til gyi snod ni sbyin ba ste //
T02TD1348E:15a-20: ba skyob ke'u yis ba la reg par byed pa dang //
T02TD1348E:15a-21: mkhas min dag kyang gnyis skyes rnams la ston mo ster //
T02TD1348E:15a-22: gang+g'a'i chu ni rus sbal dang ni nya yis 'thungs //
T02TD1348E:15a-23: ma skyes pa yis bha ra ta yi grags pa thos //
T02TD1348E:15a-24: de rnams la ni sngon bsags las kyi 'bras bu med //
T02TD1348E:15a-25: dran pa'i tshad ma yis ni dka' thub nyams 'gyur min //
T02TD1348E:15a-26: aa shvattha la brten dang til snod sbyin pa gang //
T02TD1348E:15a-27: ba la reg dang gnyis skyes tshim pa ci yin dang //
T02TD1348E:15a-28: gang+g'a'i chu dang bha ra ta ni thos pa ci //
T02TD1348E:15a-29: lam ni nyams par gyur pas 'di nyid mi shes so //
T02TD1348E:15a-30: yon tan 'phel ba yul gyis rgyas par 'gyur ba yi //
T02TD1348E:15a-31: gang la steng dang 'og tu lcug ma rgyas par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:15a-32: mi yi 'jig rten du ni las kyis bcings pa yi //
T02TD1348E:15a-33: 'og tu rtsa ba rnams ni tshugs par 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD1348E:15a-34: de bzhin gzugs med gang la nye bar thob pa med //
T02TD1348E:15a-35: thog ma med la tha ma med cing rab gnas med //
T02TD1348E:15a-36: aa shvattha shing de la nges par brten pa ni //
T02TD1348E:15a-37: klu don 'bras bu las ni rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T02TD1348E:15a-38: til ni sems can yin zhing snod nyid snod yin te //
T02TD1348E:15a-39: shing rnams rab tu sbyin pa til snod sbyin pa'o //
T02TD1348E:15b-0: ba ni @15b lha yi mig yin reg pa snang ba ste //
T02TD1348E:15b-1: ba la reg pa 'di nyid nges par brjod par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:15b-2: gnyis skyes me ste srog chags tshogs kyi lus la ni //
T02TD1348E:15b-3: tshim par byed pa de ni gnyis skyes tshim pa'o //
T02TD1348E:15b-4: gang+g'a'i chu nyid zla ba'i bdud rtsi btung ba ste //
T02TD1348E:15b-5: ser sna zad pa bha ra ta ni thos pa'o //
T02TD1348E:15b-6: phyi ma'i tshe yi rgyu ru sgra mkhan gyis kyang ni //
T02TD1348E:15b-7: rig byed ma lus yi ge kha ton byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:15b-8: dran pa dang ni rig byed gzhung gi sna tshogs pa //
T02TD1348E:15b-9: mi shes dbang gis 'bras med mgrin pa skams par byed //
T02TD1348E:15b-10: rig byed tshad ma dang ni dran pa tshad ma sta //
T02TD1348E:15b-11: 'di nyid tshig ni shin tu 'gal ba'i phyogs yin no //
T02TD1348E:15b-12: dam pa'i chos las gsungs pa'i tshig ni tshad ma ste //
T02TD1348E:15b-13: rgyal ba'i gsung ni 'di nyid rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1348E:15b-14: nub phyogs sindhu'i yul du gnyis skyes rnams kyis ni //
T02TD1348E:15b-15: thod pa can dang dmangs rigs dag gi zan za ru //
T02TD1348E:15b-16: ri bcas yul du ba lang sha dang ma he dang //
T02TD1348E:15b-17: de bzhin du yang chang ni gtsang mar bsten pa yin ;
T02TD1348E:15b-18: / goo ta ma la sogs yul du ma he'i sha gtsang bar //
T02TD1348E:15b-19: ma ga la sogs yul du rta sha la sogs bsten //
T02TD1348E:15b-20: aindra la sogs dang ni ma gsog yul du //
T02TD1348E:15b-21: ma he'i sha dang phag sha bza' bar mi rung ngo //
T02TD1348E:15b-22: mgul kha la sogs yul du ma sogs bzung ba ni //
T02TD1348E:15b-23: bu la sogs pa rnams la gtsang mar bshad pa yin //
T02TD1348E:15b-24: gang gi yul de dag tu 'dod pa'i dngos grub ni //
T02TD1348E:15b-25: de nyid byas na mi rnams la ni skyon med do //
T02TD1348E:15b-26: gal te gnyis skyes rnams ni dran pa'i tshig dag gis //
T02TD1348E:15b-27: ltung 'gyur de lta na ni de rnams rang yul du //
T02TD1348E:15b-28: dran tshig skyon gyis char than du ni ji ltar 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:15b-29: de ltar de ru gnyis skyes tshe la dran pa ni //
T02TD1348E:15b-30: yul gyi tha snyad kyis ni tshad ma ma yin no //
T02TD1348E:15b-31: thub pa rnams kyis lo rgyus tshogs kyang gang bstan pa //
T02TD1348E:15b-32: de ni bden nam brdzun pa rnam par dpyad par bgyi //
T02TD1348E:15b-33: rab brtan dag dang sa srung dang ni g-yung drung dang //
T02TD1348E:15b-34: me tog sogs dang lha mo dang ni dpal mo dang //
T02TD1348E:15b-35: zla ba bdud rtse 'o ma'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa las //
T02TD1348E:15b-36: 'di rnams 'byung zhes lo rgyus kyi ni tshig yin no //
T02TD1348E:15b-37: gal te stobs ldan rgyal srid du ni zla ba 'di //
T02TD1348E:15b-38: byung na long ba'i 'thab mo'i dus su yod ma yin //
T02TD1348E:15b-39: zla ba med nas gzhi la ni zla ches dang //
T02TD1348E:15b-40: tshes la zla ba'i lnga ji ltar yin te 'dir //
T02TD1348E:16a-1: ral pa 'dzin pa'i dbang phyug gis //
T02TD1348E:16a-2: zla ba la ni zhen pas long ba gsad pa yin //
T02TD1348E:16a-3: phyi nas dus kyi dbang gis stobs ldan bskyed pa ste //
T02TD1348E:16a-4: de nas lha dbang rnams kyis rgya mtsho bsrubs pa yin //
T02TD1348E:16a-5: gal te brdzun gyi lo rgyus kyi ni tshig rnams kyis //
T02TD1348E:16a-6: chos sgyur de lta na ni bden tshig ci zhig bya //
T02TD1348E:16a-7: srog gcod mthu yis gal te mtho ris 'gyur na ni //
T02TD1348E:16a-8: gzhan la phan pas de ltar dmyal bar 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD1348E:16a-9: lo rgyus chos rnams dang ni dran pa mkhas rnams kyis //
T02TD1348E:16a-10: rnam par dpyad par byas nas brdzun du gyur pa ste //
T02TD1348E:16a-11: de phyir chos de mi shes byis pa bram zes byas //
T02TD1348E:16a-12: rang gi phyi sa bzhin du rnam par mi dpyad do //
T02TD1348E:16a-13: gal te rig byed 'di ni mkha' bzhin ma byas pa //
T02TD1348E:16a-14: ji ltar 'di ni kha las 'don par byed pa yin //
T02TD1348E:16a-15: nor dang chags pa zhen pa'i bram ze rnams kyis ni //
T02TD1348E:16a-16: mgrin pa mchu dang rkan sogs kyis ni nan tan byed //
T02TD1348E:16a-17: gal te rig byed snga ma yin na yul skad med //
T02TD1348E:16a-18: sngon du yul skad yin na rig byed thog mar med //
T02TD1348E:16a-19: gal te rang byung yin na kha las ma skyes te //
T02TD1348E:16a-20: gal te thams cad khyab na kun gyis 'don par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:16a-21: aandha'i shing dang sna tshogs 'bru dang mar dang zan //
T02TD1348E:16a-22: bde ba'i don du 'bar ba'i thab tu sreg par byed //
T02TD1348E:16a-23: sha za ba yi mi ni shin tu skrag par byed //
T02TD1348E:16a-24: me lha 'di dag la sogs mi 'dod tshig yin no //
T02TD1348E:16a-25: bud med pas ni mtho ris gnas su mi 'gro na //
T02TD1348E:16a-26: 'jig rten grags pa'i tshad ma gal te 'dir 'gyur te //
T02TD1348E:16a-27: ne tso la sogs gzhan yang gzhon nu'i dus su ni //
T02TD1348E:16a-28: dka' thub byas nas tshangs pa'i gnas su zhugs par gyur //
T02TD1348E:16a-29: rig byed las ni gzhan bshad dran pa'i tshig ni gzhan //
T02TD1348E:16a-30: rnal 'byor rig pa yis ni gcig nyid mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1348E:16a-31: rig byed tshog [?] ni rnal 'byor gyis bsten thar pa ste //
T02TD1348E:16a-32: 'khor ba'i 'bras bu nges par dran pas ster ba ni //
T02TD1348E:16a-33: 'khor bas bcings pa'i 'khyam pa 'jug par gyur pa ste //
T02TD1348E:16a-34: de phyir dran pa'i sems ni 'di nyid 'dod ma yin //
T02TD1348E:16a-35: sdug bsngal 'phrog byed thar pa'i go 'phang zhugs par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:16a-36: ye shes bdud rtsi dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'dod do //
T02TD1348E:16a-37: de ltar dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal dman blo ngan ni //
T02TD1348E:16b-0: gnyis skyes rnams la kun @16b nas lam ni nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:16b-1: mi shes pa yi dbang gis srog gcod byas nas ni //
T02TD1348E:16b-2: rang rig nga rgyal dbang gis dmyal bar zhugs par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:16b-3: tshangs pa dang ni dbang phyug khyab 'jug gzugs gcig 'dir //
T02TD1348E:16b-4: drag pos ci yi phyir na tshangs pa'i mgo bo gcod //
T02TD1348E:16b-5: gal te drag po sdig med 'jig rten grags pas na //
T02TD1348E:16b-6: ci phyir thod pa bor nas de ni dag par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:16b-7: drag po phyag dar 'di ni gtsang ma ma yin la //
T02TD1348E:16b-8: gal te bsod nams rgyu ru rig par mi byed cing //
T02TD1348E:16b-9: de nyid spyi bo nas ni lhung 'gyur gtsang ba na //
T02TD1348E:16b-10: gang+g'a'i chu yis ci yi phyir na khrus 'di byed //
T02TD1348E:16b-11: yan lag sna tshogs pa ni khrus la sbyar ba yis //
T02TD1348E:16b-12: nam mkha' las ni 'gro ba sa la ltung bar 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:16b-13: 'dod pa'i rgyu ru gang+g'a'i chu la gang zhugs pa //
T02TD1348E:16b-14: rmangs pa de ni de ru 'gro ba gang na rigs //
T02TD1348E:16b-15: khyab 'jug lus la dpal mo rang dbang gal te 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:16b-16: r'a mas ci phyir de ru sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ;
T02TD1348E:16b-17: / kun mkhyen khyab 'jug gal te 'jig rten grags pa na //
T02TD1348E:16b-18: bud med bral ba'i dbang gis ci phyir phyugs rnams 'gro //
T02TD1348E:16b-19: gang gis sa la rkang pa gsum du byas pa na //
T02TD1348E:16b-20: chu la de yis ci phyir zam pa bcing bar byed //
T02TD1348E:16b-21: gang gi lto ba na gnas ma lus srid gsum na //
T02TD1348E:16b-22: de yi rang gi chung ma ci phyir 'phrog par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:16b-23: 'di dag la sogs du ma rnam pa stong phrag gis //
T02TD1348E:16b-24: tshig rnams kyis ni mi rnams sdug bsngal ster bar byed //
T02TD1348E:16b-25: rnam par dpyad na don kun med par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1348E:16b-26: gnyis skyes rigs kyi nga rgyal dbang gis yang dag bstan //
T02TD1348E:16b-27: dang po phas ni rab tu skye bar byed pa dang //
T02TD1348E:16b-28: phyi nas mas ni mngal gyi dbang gis grags par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:16b-29: de ltar mngal nas skyes pa'i nges pas gnyis skyes 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:16b-30: gzhan du na ni dmangs rigs dbang gis mi ma yin //
T02TD1348E:16b-31: mngal nas skyes pas byis pa dang ni lhan cig tu //
T02TD1348E:16b-32: mngal gyi nang nas tshangs pa'i skud pa byung ba min //
T02TD1348E:16b-33: de rnams la ni cho ga 'di nyid byas nas su //
T02TD1348E:16b-34: gnyis skyes ming gi rgyu ru mgrin par rab tu min //
T02TD1348E:16b-35: gnyis skyes nyin gcig lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD1348E:16b-36: cho ga byas pa'i skud pas gzhan mar gyur pa ni //
T02TD1348E:16b-37: gnyis skyes ma lus rnams la co 'dri'i don du ste //
T02TD1348E:17a-1: bsam pa sna tshogs ae ma ngo mtshar che //
T02TD1348E:17a-2: khyab 'jug de nyid blo yis rab tu 'jug pa gzhan //
T02TD1348E:17a-3: shing las skyes pa'i dbyug pa 'dzin par byed pa yis //
T02TD1348E:17a-4: dgun la sogs pa'i dus kyi mtshan mo'i mtha' ru ni //
T02TD1348E:17a-5: 'dar ba dang ldan chu yis khrus ni byed pa ste //
T02TD1348E:17a-6: grang bas 'dzin dang rab tu 'dar ba'i lus la ni //
T02TD1348E:17a-7: bsam gtan dang ni sngags bzlas bzang po de ru gang //
T02TD1348E:17a-8: dper na gdug pa'i sbrul ni khyim du zhugs pa yi //
T02TD1348E:17a-9: mun pas bkab pa de ru bsam pa med pa ltar //
T02TD1348E:17a-10: lus dang ngag dang sems ni dbyug pa gsum yin te //
T02TD1348E:17a-11: sems ni 'dus par bya ba dbyug pa gcig yin no //
T02TD1348E:17a-12: dpal ldan tshangs pa'i gzugs ni mtha' med gcig pu ste //
T02TD1348E:17a-13: chu la zhugs pa'i dbyug pa can gyis mi 'dzin no //
T02TD1348E:17a-14: zhi ba bas kyang thal bas lus po byug par byed //
T02TD1348E:17a-15: khrus kyi mtha' ru so gnyis dbang po blo yin te //
T02TD1348E:17a-16: bde ba'i don du ral ba'i khu tshur rtag tu 'dzin //
T02TD1348E:17a-17: 'dod pa'i me tog rnams kyis rdo nyid mchod par byed //
T02TD1348E:17a-18: gzhan ma thod pa rnams dang mgo bo 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD1348E:17a-19: lus la mi yi rus pas rgyan rnams byed pa ste //
T02TD1348E:17a-20: dpal ldan dngos grub rgyu ru dur khrod 'khor bar byed //
T02TD1348E:17a-21: mi shes dbang gis blo ngan la ni dngos grub gang //
T02TD1348E:17a-22: gdong nag dang ni de bzhin phyugs bdag gzhan ma yin //
T02TD1348E:17a-23: gcer bu dang ni ral pa ring bo skra bregs pa //
T02TD1348E:17a-24: slob pa 'khor nas zhi bar rab tu 'gro bar 'dod //
T02TD1348E:17a-25: thar pa'i go 'phang grub nas 'gro bar 'gyur min no //
T02TD1348E:17a-26: gzhan ma rnams kyang gcer bu dang ni skra phyung dang //
T02TD1348E:17a-27: so dang bcas pa yan lag thams cad dri mas byugs //
T02TD1348E:17a-28: bkres dang skom pas 'dzin pas blong na [*blo ngan?] 'ching par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:17a-29: thar pa'i lam las nam yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1348E:17a-30: gzhan ma rnams kyis dbyar gyi dus su shing drung pa //
T02TD1348E:17a-31: sos ka dang ni dpyid kyi dus su tshang ba can //
T02TD1348E:17a-32: dgun gyi dus su bla gab med pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1348E:17a-33: don dam pa yi rgyu ru sdug bsngal chen po byed //
T02TD1348E:17a-34: gcer bu pa la kun nas seng ge'i khri dang ni //
T02TD1348E:17a-35: mgo bo'i skra rnams phyung ba la ni gdugs gsum dang //
T02TD1348E:17a-36: dri mas byugs la sngon du mya ngan med shing las //
T02TD1348E:17a-37: lha yi me tog 'bab pa rigs pa ma yin no //
T02TD1348E:17a-38: gzhan ma yang ni mgo sbu bregs pa'i dge slong nyid //
T02TD1348E:17a-39: dur smrig 'dzin cing 'dod pa'i lha gang gnas par byed //
T02TD1348E:17b-0: ting nge @17b 'dzin gyis dman pa nor ni sogs par 'dod //
T02TD1348E:17b-1: ta la steng nas bcad bzhin zad par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1348E:17b-2: gzhan ma rnams kyang rigs kyi gnas su rab zhugs nas //
T02TD1348E:17b-3: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa mang po za bar byed //
T02TD1348E:17b-4: snying rje dang bral mnyam pa'i bde bas dman pa dang //
T02TD1348E:17b-5: 'jig rten 'gal ba rnams la yang dag spyod par byed //
T02TD1348E:17b-6: skye ba bdun pa'i mi ni nges par phyugs yin te //
T02TD1348E:17b-7: de yi bdud rtsis mi la dngos grub myur bar ster //
T02TD1348E:17b-8: rigs kyi lung las rul ba'i dri ni gtsang ba ste //
T02TD1348E:17b-9: 'jigs par byed pa rnams la bstan par mi bya'o //
T02TD1348E:17b-10: gzhan yang zhi ba'i rgyu ru rnam pa sna tshogs pas //
T02TD1348E:17b-11: dgod pa dang bcas rnal 'byor 'dzin par byed pa ste //
T02TD1348E:17b-12: rab mchog yan lag dang ldan rnams la zhe sdang dang //
T02TD1348E:17b-13: chags pa dang ldan rgyu ru dpal ldan tshangs spyod byed //
T02TD1348E:17b-14: rmi lam du yang gang zhig bud med sbyor la zhen //
T02TD1348E:17b-15: dpal ldan tshangs pa'i dka' thub can de ji ltar na //
T02TD1348E:17b-16: dper na mar gyi gong bu 'bar ba'i me yis ni //
T02TD1348E:17b-17: skad cig tsam gyis zhu ba nyid du 'gyur bzhin no //
T02TD1348E:17b-18: de ltar bla ma dam pa'i zhal dman glen pa yis //
T02TD1348E:17b-19: sdug bsngal mang po ster ba'i lam ni 'dzin par byed //
T02TD1348E:17b-20: bde ba'i rgyu ru yang ni bsod nams kyis dman pa //
T02TD1348E:17b-21: dmyal ba rnams kyi me la nyal sa tshol bar byed //
T02TD1348E:17b-22: rang gi sems la sdug bsngal 'di ni 'phel 'gyur na //
T02TD1348E:17b-23: skye ba du ma brgya yis bde ba ster mi 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:17b-24: zhing rnams la ni ci tshe'i sa bon btab pa las //
T02TD1348E:17b-25: s'a lu'i sa bon khyad par can du mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1348E:17b-26: tshangs pa'i shing las chu shing 'bras bu 'gyur ba min //
T02TD1348E:17b-27: smyug ma bu ram shing dang chu las mar nyid min //
T02TD1348E:17b-28: dug las bcud len khyad par can du 'gyur ba med //
T02TD1348E:17b-29: rang gi sems las sdug bsngal las ni bde 'gyur min //
T02TD1348E:17b-30: sems la sdug bsngal sa bon yang dag btab pa na //
T02TD1348E:17b-31: skye ba du ma rnams la 'phel bar 'gyur ba yis //
T02TD1348E:17b-32: de phyir rnam dag rnams kyis rnam par dpyad nas ni //
T02TD1348E:17b-33: mnyam pa'i bde ba nyams pa yongs su don bya zhing //
T02TD1348E:17b-34: srog nyid shi nas phyi nas skye ba med pa ni //
T02TD1348E:17b-35: rigs can gzhan rnams nyams par gyur pas ston byed cing //
T02TD1348E:17b-36: gal te de ltar yin na ci phyir drag po yis //
T02TD1348E:17b-37: 'chi bar gyur pa rnams kyis zhi gnas 'jug par byed //
T02TD1348E:18a-1: ris bde ba'i rgyu ru ni //
T02TD1348E:18a-2: rang gi ling+g'a'i rtse mo'i pags pa gcod par byed //
T02TD1348E:18a-3: nyin mo'i mtha' dang mtshan mo'i steng du bza' ba ni //
T02TD1348E:18a-4: nges par stag gzig rnams kyis byed par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1348E:18a-5: rang gi las kyis shi bar gyur pa'i phyugs rnams kyis //
T02TD1348E:18a-6: de yi sha ni nye bar spyod par mi byed do //
T02TD1348E:18a-7: srog bcad rab tu byas nas de nyid za byed de //
T02TD1348E:18a-8: gzhan du na ni mi rnams mtho ris 'gro ba med //
T02TD1348E:18a-9: 'di la sogs pa 'gal ba du ma mu stegs pa //
T02TD1348E:18a-10: ngan pa rnams kyi sems la sdug bsngal shing rnams kyi //
T02TD1348E:18a-11: rtsa ba bskal pa du ma rnams su bcings pa ni //
T02TD1348E:18a-12: sangs rgyas kyis kyang dbyung bar nus pa ma yin no //
T02TD1348E:18a-13: thog med gtso bo yon tan bdag nyid rang bzhin dang //
T02TD1348E:18a-14: nga rgyal dang ni blo gros yid bcas 'byung ba dang //
T02TD1348E:18a-15: las kyi dbang yod na ni dpal ldan yul dbang po //
T02TD1348E:18a-16: 'di dag gzhan ma rnams kyis yongs su brtag par byed //
T02TD1348E:18a-17: lta ba rnams la brten pa'i du ma'i gzhung rnams dang //
T02TD1348E:18a-18: ming gi rab tu dbye bas mkhas pa mad rnams kyis //
T02TD1348E:18a-19: gang zhig rig byed mtha' dang grub mtha' gzhan rnams ni //
T02TD1348E:18a-20: nor 'dod rgyu ru de nyid rnams ni rjod par byed //
T02TD1348E:18a-21: aom bhur bhu: sva ni 'di ru gang yin dang //
T02TD1348E:18a-22: sa we tor wa re n+ye dang bha ra go de ba dang //
T02TD1348E:18a-23: sva dhi ma hi gang yin dhe ya yo na [*yon?] dang //
T02TD1348E:18a-24: pra tso ta ya gang yin nges par rig byed tshig / aom yig sngags ni mchog tu lho yi mi yin te //
T02TD1348E:18a-25: bhu ni nges par sa yig bha wa 'jig rten gsum //
T02TD1348E:18a-26: sa yig thar pa yin te sa ni drag po yin //
T02TD1348E:18a-27: we te zhes ni tshangs pa wa re n+ya ni lha min dgra //
T02TD1348E:18a-28: bhar go zhes ni chu yin de ba 'dir ni dbang por brjod //
T02TD1348E:18a-29: sva dhi zhes ni bdag yin ma hi srog gi rlung //
T02TD1348E:18a-30: dhe ya zhes ni de bzhin bdag gi go 'phang brjod //
T02TD1348E:18a-31: yon zhes ni rtag par rgyu ba chen po'o //
T02TD1348E:18a-32: pra co ta ya zhes ni de nyid rab tu bskul //
T02TD1348E:18a-33: sa be tri ni nyams pas 'jig rten pha rol 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:18a-34: ga ya tri ni ma nyams srid pa 'byung bar 'gyur ;
T02TD1348E:18a-35: / de ltar phyir gyur nang gi gnas su de bzhin no //
T02TD1348E:18a-36: aa po 'dod ba chen po srid las 'byung gnas ston //
T02TD1348E:18a-37: 'di dag la sogs pa yis nang gi thun mtshams 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:18a-38: zla dang nyi ma'i dbus su nyin dang mtshan mo ni //
T02TD1348E:18a-39: srog dang thur sel la gnas dbus su yin pa ste //
T02TD1348E:18b-0: 'khor ba'i @18b sdug bsngal 'phrog byed dag pa'i thun mtshams te //
T02TD1348E:18b-1: nyi ma nub dang de bzhin shar las gzhan ma yin //
T02TD1348E:18b-2: phyi rol glen pa rnams la gsang ba'i don du ni //
T02TD1348E:18b-3: sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis mes bos bshad pa'o //
T02TD1348E:18b-4: aom yig sa bon zhes ni nges par sku rdo rje //
T02TD1348E:18b-5: bhu ni gsung gi rang bzhin bha ba thugs nyid do //
T02TD1348E:18b-6: don dam pa yi rgyu phyir sva yig ye shes te //
T02TD1348E:18b-7: 'jig rten gsum po de nyid thub pa bzang po'i gzhung //
T02TD1348E:18b-8: drag po snang ba mtha' yas mes po gang zhig ni //
T02TD1348E:18b-9: rnam par snang mdzad de yis khyab 'jug rdo rje can //
T02TD1348E:18b-10: chu zhes pa ni rin chen 'dzin pa'i sangs rgyas te //
T02TD1348E:18b-11: dbang po rnams dag ral gri chen po 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1348E:18b-12: sva dhi zhes ni gos dkar mo ni chen mo ste //
T02TD1348E:18b-13: ma h'i zhes ni rgyal ba'i spyan mar rab tu grags //
T02TD1348E:18b-14: de bzhin dhe ya zhes ni mchog tu m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1348E:18b-15: yon zhes ni rgyal ba rnams kyi sgrol mar gsungs //
T02TD1348E:18b-16: pra tsod ya zhes ni pha rol phyin par grags //
T02TD1348E:18b-17: aa po 'dod chen zhes ni 'gro ba'i thabs yin no //
T02TD1348E:18b-18: de dag snyoms par zhugs pa thun mtshams tha dad min //
T02TD1348E:18b-19: rdo rje padma'i dbus su so sor phyag 'chal 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:18b-20: chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes ni 'o ma'i rgya mtshor gsungs //
T02TD1348E:18b-21: de yi dbus su padma chu skyes de nyid do //
T02TD1348E:18b-22: gang zhig zla ba'i gdan ni gnam lding de nyid do ;
T02TD1348E:18b-23: / gang zhig thugs kyi rdo rje khyab 'jug de nyid do //
T02TD1348E:18b-24: yang dag dgug pa rgyal ka gti mug rdo rje ste //
T02TD1348E:18b-25: so sor snang ba dag pa 'dod chags rdo rje'o //
T02TD1348E:18b-26: gang zhig mi 'dus zhes ni nga rgyal rdo rje ste //
T02TD1348E:18b-27: mi 'gag chen po zhes ni phrag dog rdo rje'o //
T02TD1348E:18b-28: grags ma zhes ni rlung yin 'bar ma dpal mo ste //
T02TD1348E:18b-29: rgyal ma chu yin rnam par rgyal ma 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1348E:18b-30: mtha' med dpal mo zhes ni rdo rje dbyings mchog yin //
T02TD1348E:18b-31: yan lag drug po 'dir ni dbang po rnams la dgod //
T02TD1348E:18b-32: chos kyi 'byung gnas la gnas padma'i dbus su ste //
T02TD1348E:18b-33: gang zhig zla ba'i gdan ni khyu mchog de nyid do //
T02TD1348E:18b-34: dbang phyug gdong pa lnga ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste //
T02TD1348E:18b-35: chu skyes lte ba la ni gzhan dag gnas pa'o //
T02TD1348E:18b-36: chos dang de bzhin 'dod ma ye shes gsum pa ste //
T02TD1348E:18b-37: chags pa dang bral dbang phyug nyid ni 'di ltar lnga //
T02TD1348E:18b-38: dbus dang mtshams rnams dag la stong pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1348E:18b-39: gzhan dag gnas shing ge sar rtse mo gzhan ma'o //
T02TD1348E:19a-0: @19a * // g-yo ba mo dang phra mo gzhan yang drag mo dang //
T02TD1348E:19a-1: dge ma la sogs gzhan ma bde 'byung nus pa gang //
T02TD1348E:19a-2: du ba la sogs ma lus pha rol phyin pa ste //
T02TD1348E:19a-3: de bzhin gzhan ni padma'i 'dab dang dbus su'o //
T02TD1348E:19a-4: dbus su dbang phyug che dang shar du skyes bu ste //
T02TD1348E:19a-5: g-yas su zad min me dang gnod sbyin nyid ni g-yon du'o //
T02TD1348E:19a-6: nub tu de ma thag ste phung lnga rnams dag yin //
T02TD1348E:19a-7: rnam par shes pa mngon du nges par rig par bya //
T02TD1348E:19a-8: sa ni ldog ma yin te chu ni rab gnas ma //
T02TD1348E:19a-9: me ni rig ma yin te rlung ni zhi ma ste //
T02TD1348E:19a-10: mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la mchod par bya bar 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:19a-11: nam mkha'i khams ni nges par bde bar gnas ma'o //
T02TD1348E:19a-12: de ltar gzhan ma rnams kyang sna tshogs rnam pa yis //
T02TD1348E:19a-13: lus dang dbang po la sogs gzhan dag mchod par 'gyur //
T02TD1348E:19a-14: ming gi rab tu dbye bas de nyid dngos po mang //
T02TD1348E:19a-15: phyi dang lus po dang ni gang zhig gzhan du gnas //
T02TD1348E:19a-16: khams sogs de nyid rnams kyis so sor mchod par bya //
T02TD1348E:19a-17: tshangs pa mo ni sa yin chu ni drag mo ste //
T02TD1348E:19a-18: me ni gzhon nu mar 'gyur rlung ni nag mo'o //
T02TD1348E:19a-19: stong pa phag mo yin zhing zla dang nyi ma me //
T02TD1348E:19a-20: dbang po lha min padma 'dzin dang padma'o //
T02TD1348E:19a-21: ye shes zhes ni 'jigs byed zhi ba nyid yin no //
T02TD1348E:19a-22: rnam shes spyan ni 'jigs byed ma ste nges par yin //
T02TD1348E:19a-23: 'bar ba dang ni phra mo rnam par rgyal ma dang //
T02TD1348E:19a-24: bzang dang phun sum dri med gzhan dang don yod ma //
T02TD1348E:19a-25: glog gi 'od zer dang ni bde kun nyi ma ni //
T02TD1348E:19a-26: sngon du rab tu dbye ba yis kyang rig par bya //
T02TD1348E:19a-27: dbang po rnams la dbang po drug po dgod pa 'dir //
T02TD1348E:19a-28: don dam pa yi rgyu yis mchod par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1348E:19a-29: sa dang chu ma rlung dang stong ba zla ba dang //
T02TD1348E:19a-30: nyi ma dang ni bdag nyid zhi ba'i rnam brgyad yin //
T02TD1348E:19a-31: rnam pa du ma las kyang rnam pa brgyad po ni //
T02TD1348E:19a-32: mi shes dbang gis glen pa rnams kyis rab tu brtags //
T02TD1348E:19a-33: 'di dag la sogs thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs ni //
T02TD1348E:19a-34: rnal 'byor ga 'phang mi shes pa yis byas pa'o //
T02TD1348E:19a-35: de shes gang gis nus pa'i bha ga zhes byar bstan //
T02TD1348E:19a-36: rnam pa gsum du 'dod cing yig gsum rtsa gsum la //
T02TD1348E:19a-37: aa dza pu ka zhes bya bzhi po de nyid de //
T02TD1348E:19a-38: de ltar de ni shin tu thim pa'i yul gcig go //
T02TD1348E:19a-39: de dbus ling+ga gnas shing thog ma'i gzugs yin te //
T02TD1348E:19b-0: thig le n'a @19b da de yi snying dbus yang dag gnas //
T02TD1348E:19b-1: dga' ba'i tshul du dri med shin tu zhi ba ste //
T02TD1348E:19b-2: de yi steng du thog ma 'khrig pa dang po'o //
T02TD1348E:19b-3: yang dag lhung ba'i tshul gyis 'dod pa rnams kyang byed //
T02TD1348E:19b-4: skal ldan bha ga zhes bya de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1348E:19b-5: de la bzhi po dag dang gzhan yang lnga po dang //
T02TD1348E:19b-6: de bzhin du ni drug dang bzhi dang lnga po dang //
T02TD1348E:19b-7: gsum po phyi rol dang ni lus kyi dbus su ste //
T02TD1348E:19b-8: rigs kyi rdzogs pa ma lus pa ni 'di yin no //
T02TD1348E:19b-9: phyi rol rigs kyi tshad du bzhi po dus kyi me //
T02TD1348E:19b-10: nyi ma dag dang sgra gcan dang ni zla bar bshad //
T02TD1348E:19b-11: sa la sogs pa lnga po yin te drug po ni //
T02TD1348E:19b-12: bkra shis la sogs yin te de bzhin bzhi po ni //
T02TD1348E:19b-13: sa la rab tu dbye bas bzhi po bshad pa'o //
T02TD1348E:19b-14: gzugs la sogs pa lnga po 'di nyid brjod pa yin //
T02TD1348E:19b-15: bar du gsum po dag ni yon tan gsum yin te //
T02TD1348E:19b-16: bha ga'i dkyil du phyi mo ma lus don yin no //
T02TD1348E:19b-17: rigs ni yang dag skye phyir thog mar bzhi po ni //
T02TD1348E:19b-18: dga' ba dang ni rnam shes rdul dang sa bon no //
T02TD1348E:19b-19: rus pa la sogs 'byung ba las skyes lnga po yin //
T02TD1348E:19b-20: drug po mig la sogs te de nas bzhi po ni //
T02TD1348E:19b-21: lag pa dang ni rkang pa bzung ste lnga po ni //
T02TD1348E:19b-22: sor mo lnga nyid rnams te gsum po gang zhig ni //
T02TD1348E:19b-23: rkang pa dang ni lag pa'i sor mo'i tshigs gsum mo //
T02TD1348E:19b-24: rab tu dbye ba 'di ni rigs kyi skye mdo las //
T02TD1348E:19b-25: bzhi po dbye ba 'di ru brgyad po gnyis yin te //
T02TD1348E:19b-26: lnga po mchog gi de rnams nyi shu lnga yin no //
T02TD1348E:19b-27: drug po la ni sum cu rtsa drug zhes su grags //
T02TD1348E:19b-28: gzhan yang bcu gnyis de rnams bzhi po'i dbye bas so //
T02TD1348E:19b-29: lnga po dbye ba 'di ru nyi shu yin pa ste //
T02TD1348E:19b-30: gsum pa la ni dbye ba drug cur bshad pa'o //
T02TD1348E:19b-31: rigs kyi rim pa gcig gis nyung ba bdun cu brgyad //
T02TD1348E:19b-32: de nyid bsdus pa ru ni nyi shu rtsa bdun te //
T02TD1348E:19b-33: phyi dang lus po las ni rnam par dpyad nas ni //
T02TD1348E:19b-34: rigs kyi lam la gnas pa rigs ni blang bar gyis //
T02TD1348E:19b-35: 'di dag la sogs thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs ni //
T02TD1348E:19b-36: rnal 'byor go 'phang mi shes rtag par gnas pa dang //
T02TD1348E:19b-37: longs spyod du ma la ni 'dod pa can rnams kyis //
T02TD1348E:19b-38: bsod nams rgyu ru yang ni yang dag ston par byed //
T02TD1348E:19b-39: bsod nams mtha' ru slar yang sdig pa nyid yin te //
T02TD1348E:19b-40: sdig pa'i mtha' ru yang ni bsod nams nyid yin no //
T02TD1348E:19b-41: tha ma pa yis dus su 'khor lo 'dar bskor te //
T02TD1348E:19b-42: sa la nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo bzhin du'o //
T02TD1348E:20a-0: @20a * // yul las byung ba'i sdig dang bsod nams gang zhig ni //
T02TD1348E:20a-1: gang gis rab tu spangs na skad cig gis sreg byed //
T02TD1348E:20a-2: de phyir ye shes chen po'i me ni ma nyams pa //
T02TD1348E:20a-3: mnyam pa'i bde ba'i rgyu ru bsten par bya ba'o //
T02TD1348E:20a-4: thams cad mkhyen pa gcig yin bla ma gcig yin te //
T02TD1348E:20a-5: de bzhin ye shes gcig yin srid dang thar pa gcig / gcig min rgyu ru yang ni rnal 'byor nyams pa yis //
T02TD1348E:20a-6: rang dang gzhan gyi don nyams byed pa'am 'khrug par byed //
T02TD1348E:20a-7: ji ltar sangs rgyas mthu yis bdag gi lta ba ni //
T02TD1348E:20a-8: zhi 'gyur de bzhin mi rnams la ni 'gyur bar shog / thams cad du ni du ma'i lam la brten pa yi //
T02TD1348E:20a-9: sems ni rgyal ba'i thugs rje chen por 'gyur bar shog / dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sprul pa'i sku padma dkar pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1348E:20a-11: // / kha che'i pandi ta zla ba'i mgon pos bsgyur nas gtan la phab pa'o //
